אזהרת טריגר - הטרדה מינית
אני אתחיל בהצהרה - אני לא אוהבת שנוגעים בי בלי רשות, לא משנה באיזה קטע. זה מכווץ אותי.
הייתי אתמול בישיבה ואחת מהעובדות במשרד הזיזה לי את החצאית כי זה חשוף מידי וזה לא נעים ויש כאן אנשים. הסתכלתי עליה בwtf ואמרתי לה שזה ממש לא בסדר ואם יש משהו כזה שתגיד לי ולא פשוט תיגע בי. אני מבינה שהיא חושבת שזה לטובתי אבל הרגשתי איך זה מדכא אותי. מסתיר אותי. מקטין ומקווץ אותי.
הנחיתות של ימי ראשון במשרד תמיד קשות לי. ביחוד אחרי אירועים בהם אני מרגישה הכי משוחררת (דוגמאת הליאנקאה בשישי).
אבל זה ממש הוריד אותי, הנחית אותי למציאות בה הירך שלי עושה רע לאנשים.
וזה כלכך כאב לי.
כל מה שרציתי לעשוץ זה ללכת הביתה ולהיכנס למיטה ולעשן פייסל ולהדחיק.
אבל החלטתי ללכת לים, לחוף ריק ולהיכנס ערומה למים. ולנכס לעצמי מחדש את הגוף שלי.
ואחרי שבאמת ככה היה, וחזרתי לעצמי, ורקדתי וצחקתי וצעקתי ושרתי. הגיע מישהו לחוף (רצועת חוף של קילומטר בערך ואני הייתי היחידה שם) התיישב ליד הדברים שלי כשאני הייתי במים, התפשט ונכנס גם.
עד כה הכל סבבה, זכותו, ועירום זה טיבעי.
הוא הציע הצעה מינית ואמרתי לו מאוד בכבוד שאני לא העיניין ושיתפוס ממני קצת מרחק. 
הרגשתי לא בנוח והבטן שלי אמרה לי לכי אז לקחתי את הדברים שלי ויצאתי בחזרה לחוף (הליכה של חצי שעה על סלעים והריסות, לא מקום סימפטי להיות בו בלחץ) ואז הוא התחיל ללכת אחרי. 
עצרתי במרחק ממנו כדי לתת לו לעבור ושלא ילך אחרי (כבר התחיל להחשיך).
הוא ניגש אלי שוב , אחרי שכבר סירבתי לו, והציע שוב את אותן הצעות. אמרתי לו כבר ביותר תקיפות שיתרק ממני ושאני לא מעוניינת ןהנוכחות שלו לא עושה לי טוב, הוא ניסה להמשיך לדבר ופשוט צעקתי עליו שיעזוב אותי.
הוא התחיל ללכת, חיכיתי שיתרחק (הדרך חזרה מסוכנת ובלי שדה ראיה רחב)
התחלתי ללכת, אחרי כמה דקות אני רואה אותו 3 מטר ממני, הולך ליכיווני.
ומנסה שוב.
בשלב זה כבר התעלמתי ממנו, לא הסתכלתי עליו ולא עניתי לו. ואז הוא אמר משפט שלחץ לי בנקודע רגישה סליחה שנולדתי שחור ובתור אדם שמאמין בשוויון לא יכולתי לשתוק ואמרתי לו שזה ממש ממש לא קשור לצבע העור שלו. זה בגלל שהוא מטריד אותי, ולא עוזב אותי ושאם הוא היה לבן הייתי מפחדת באותה המידה. הסתובבתי והתחלתי להגביר קצב. הולכת ממש מהר על סלעים לא יציבים שצריך להקדיש תשומת לב לכל צעד. הוא צעק לי מילות חיבה ושוב התחיל ללכת אחרי. פה כבר פתחתי בריצה. באתי לחוף האהוב עלי, להשתחרר. ומצאתי את עצמי רצה בוכה וחוששת. עם כאב בטן מחרדה על סף התקף. רצתי את כל החוף עד לרכב וגם עכשיו, שעבר לילה. אני עדיין בחרדה. מרגישה שלא משנה מה אני אעשה אני אצא מפסידה, מושפלת, קטנה.

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
consumer: I would like assistance please
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I'm Anat, I'm with you if it's convenient for you to talk now
consumer: Hi
agent: You wrote that you want assistance, would you like to share more details
consumer: Can I send the story?
agent: sure, as long as it's written without a file to open
consumer: I want to share something that hurts me - it's long..
Trigger warning - sexual harassment
I'll start with a statement - I don't like being touched without permission, no matter what. It shrinks me.
I was in a yeshiva yesterday and one of the workers in the office moved my skirt because it's too exposed and it's not pleasant and there are people here. I looked at her wtf and told her that this is really wrong and if there is something like that you should tell me and not just touch it Me. I understand that she thinks it's for my benefit, but I felt how it depressed me. hiding me Reduces and shrinks me.
Sunday landings at the office are always difficult for me. Especially after events where I feel the most liberated (for example, the Lianekaa on Friday).
But it really brought me down, landed me in a reality where my hip hurts people.
And it hurt me so much.
All I wanted to do was go home and get into bed and smoke Faisal and suppress.
But I decided to go to the sea, to an empty beach and enter the water naked. and re-appropriate my body.
And after it really was like that, and I came back to myself, and danced and laughed and shouted and sang. Someone came to the beach (a stretch of beach of about a kilometer and I was the only one there) sat down next to my things when I I was in the water, undressed and went in too.
So far everything is fine, his right, and nudity is normal.
He made a sexual proposal and I told him very respectfully that I was not interested and that he would keep some distance from me.
I felt uncomfortable and my stomach told me to go so I took my things and went back to the beach (a half hour walk on rocks and rubble, not a sympathetic place to be stressed) and then he started following me.
I stopped at a distance from him to let him pass and not follow me (it was already getting dark).
He approached me again, after I had already refused him, and offered the same offers again. I already told him very firmly to get rid of me and that I am not interested, that his presence does me no good, he tried to continue talking and I simply shouted at him to leave me.
He started to walk A, I waited for him to move away (the way back is dangerous and without a wide field of vision)
I started walking, after a few minutes I see him 3 meters from me, walking in my direction.
and tries again.
At this point I was already ignoring him, I didn't look at him and I didn't answer him. Then he said a sentence that hit me in a sensitive spot, sorry I was born black and as a person who believes in equality I couldn't keep quiet and I told him it really, really had nothing to do with the color of his skin. It's because he bothers me, and won't leave me, and if he was white I would be just as scared. I turned around and started to pick up the pace. Walking really fast on unstable rocks you have to pay attention to every step. He shouted affectionate words to me and started following me again. Here I already started running. I came to my favorite beach, to let loose. And I found myself running around crying and afraid. With a stomach ache from anxiety on the verge of an attack. I ran the whole beach to the car and even now, after night. I'm still anxious. I feel that no matter what I do, I will come out a loser, humiliated, small.
agent: You went through such a scary experience, it makes sense that you still experience anxiety. And at the same time you defended yourself, you behaved responsibly and with a lot of resourcefulness
consumer: I went to another beach today with a lot of people, and I still felt really bad
agent: It sounds like you are a woman with a lot of emotional awareness of what is happening to you. You performed an act of corrective experience and did not give up what sounds like your favorite place - the sea just because you experienced harassment and danger on the isolated beach
consumer: how to deal? What to do with the anxiety?
agent: If I understand correctly, MD Weber in a fresh case. You do everything right, talk about it, write it. It's a process that can take time
consumer: Yes, it happened yesterday
consumer: The sea was my safe place, the place I would come to every day for everything, to laugh and cry everything
agent: It's really so fresh. Everyone experiences the trauma of injury/harassment in a different way. If there are people close to you that you can share the experience with, it can sometimes help
agent: You wrote that the sea calms you and at the same time you experienced existential fear there, it can be very frustrating that the place that was always a refuge for you has become a painful memory
consumer: Is there a recommendation for how I can turn it back into a pleasant place?
agent: First of all it depends on who you are, if you have friends you can go to Share with them what happened and ask them to go to the beach with you, or like you did today find a stretch of beach with a lot of people, even in an area with families and children. Maybe you will be a little more limited but you will be able to continue to feel the sea and the waves that you love so much
agent: And it's equally important to know that these things take time
consumer: Thank you
agent: No problem, we are here for you for any purpose. Whenever you feel the need, you are welcome to talk to us. or on WhatsApp or on the 1202 telephone line. If it's in difficult moments or if only in doubt

לא בטוחה אם הבנתי נכון באיזו משבצת הסיפור שלי יושב (ובהתאם מה אומר חוק ההתיישנות).
הפוגע הוא בן-דוד שלי (נחשב גילוי עריות?) שהיה בעצמו קטין (סביבות גילאי 17-16) בזמן הפגיעה.
אני הייתי בערך בת 5-6 ומאז עברו 22 שנה.
לפני כמה שנים התעמתתי איתו והוא הודה במעשים אבל לא עשיתי עם זה כלום מאז..
הייתי שמחה לדעת אם יש בכלל פתח לתלונה במשטרה / תביעה אזרחית או שמאוחר מידי?
תודה מראש.
consumer: כן
agent: היי, עברת כילדה פגיעה מאדם קרוב כל כך. אני ענת ואני איתך אם מתאים לך לשוחח עכשיו
consumer: אשמח
תודה ענת
agent: פער הגילאים ביניכם לא משאיר ספק לגבי כוונת הפוגע. העובדה שהוא הודה במעשיו לאחר שנים לא מפחיתה את הכאב שאת סוחבת איתך כל החיים.
agent: כתבת שאת מבקשת לקבל מידע לגבי אפשרויות של תלונה או תביעה, חשוב להבין שזה יכול לפתוח את הפצע שאת נושאת בתוכך ולהכאיב עוד יותר
consumer: יודעת, לוקחת את זה בחשבון וגם מוקפת בסביבה תומכת (ובטיפול)
פשוט לא יודעת אם זו בכלל אפשרות שעדיין קיימת
agent: טוב שאת מוקפת ופתוחה עם אנשים לגבי הפגיעה. לגופו של עניין מדובר בחוק ההתיישנות וקשה לדעת בלי להכיר את המקרה האם הוא חל במקרה שלך. למעשה רק הפרקלטות תדע לתת על זה מענה לאחר שילמדו את המקרה. אנחנו במרכז הסיוע יכולות ללוות אותך בתהליך ולעזור לך להחליט אם כדאי לך להתחיל אותו ולהבין את ההשלכות שלו
consumer: אוקיי, נשמע חשוב..
מה כןלל בעצם ליווי כזה?
agent: זה מאוד תלוי, חלק ממנו זה קשר שלנו איתך בקווי הסיוע, אפשר מעבר לזה לקיים גם שיחות סיוע פרונטליות ועד ליווי פיזי להגשת תלונה ופגישות עם הפרקליטות. אם תרצי אוכל לקשר אותך עם רכזת סיוע במרכז הסיוע שקרוב למקום מגורייך כדי לבחון את כל האפשרויות
consumer: אשמח. מניחה שתא הכי קרוב אליי
agent: אוקי. מכיוון שהווצאפ הוא קו ארצי, אעביר פניה אל מרכז תא כדי שיחזרו אליך. לשם כך אצטרך שתכתבי לי את מספר הטלפון אליו תרצי שיתקשרו ואת שמך.
consumer: בסדר גמור
שירי 0509050441
consumer: ותודה רבה
agent: אין על מה שירי. אעביר את הפרטים. זה יכול לקחת כמה ימים עד שיחזרו אליך ובדכ זה ממספר טלפון חסוי (רק מיידעת). אנחנו בווצאפ כאן בשבילך לכל דבר כמובן
consumer: תודה רבה
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, I would like to receive information about options for filing a complaint about an old, old case.. I have a hard time picking up the phone and asking, but maybe that way it will be easier...
Not sure if I understood correctly in which slot my story sits (and depending on what the statute of limitations says).
The abuser is my cousin (is it considered incest?) who was himself a minor (around the age of 16-17) at the time of the abuse.
I was about 5-6 years old and 22 years have passed since then.
A few years ago I confronted him and he admitted to the actions, but I haven't done anything about it since..
I would be happy to know if there is even an opening for a police complaint / civil lawsuit or is it too late?
Thanks in advance.
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hey, as a child you were hurt by someone so close. I am Anat and I am with you if it suits you to chat h now
consumer: I would love to
Thank you Anat
agent: The age gap between you leaves no doubt about the intent of the attacker. The fact that he admitted his actions years later does not lessen the pain you carry with you all your life.
agent: You wrote that you want to receive information about the possibilities of a complaint or lawsuit, it is important to understand that this can open the wound you carry inside you and hurt even more
consumer: knows, takes it into account and is also surrounded by a supportive environment (and treatment)
I just don't know if this is even an option that still exists
agent: It's good that you are surrounded and open with people about the injury. As a matter of fact, this is the statute of limitations and it is difficult to know without knowing the case whether it applies in your case. In fact, only the attorney's office will know how to answer this after they study you the case We at the assistance center can accompany you through the process and help you decide if you should start it and understand its consequences
consumer: Okay, sounds important..
What exactly is such an escort?
agent: It really depends, part of it is our contact with you on the help lines, it is possible to have face-to-face assistance calls as well as physical accompaniment for filing a complaint and meetings with the attorney's office. If you want I can put you in touch with an assistance coordinator at the assistance center closest to your place of residence to examine all the options
consumer: I would love to. Guess the cabin closest to me
Agent: Okay. Since WhatsApp is a national line, I will transfer her to a call center so they get back to you. For that I will need you to write me the phone number you want them to call and your name.
co nsumer: just fine
Shiri 0509050441
consumer: And thank you very much
agent: nothing to sing about. I will pass on the details. It can take a few days until they get back to you and usually it's from a confidential phone number (just letting you know). We at WhatsApp are here for you for anything of course
consumer: Thank you very much

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I'm Anat, I'm with you if it's convenient for you to talk now
consumer: Hello, I've been sexually assaulted in the past and I can't let go
agent: Hey, would you like to share what the feelings are that don't let go
consumer: fear anxiety
consumer: Guilt I could have done otherwise
agent: You describe feelings and emotions that many victims experience. It sounds like the trauma you experienced from the injury continues to accompany you even today and it overwhelms you with these feelings
consumer: true
consumer: It's very scary to trust people
consumer: It doesn't matter what their gender is
agent: Part of the sexual abuse is also the loss of control and trust in people, it's natural what you feel
consumer: I don't know what to do, I want a solution, I want to feel safe again
a gent: It is very exhausting to go through long periods with the desire to feel safe and surrounded by people and in practice not to trust anyone, it can be very lonely
consumer: true
agent: You wrote that you were hurt in the past, are there people around you who are aware of the hurt
consumer: very little
agent: sometimes the biggest difficulty is being alone with your fears and on the other hand you said that it's hard for you to trust people. It's good that you write to us, sometimes the conversations about the fears and the trauma can make it easier
consumer: who to talk to
agent: people who are in your life, family, friends, and if there are none then you can also contact professionals
agent: And we at the helpline are here for exactly that
consumer: It's hard to trust
agent: It's completely understandable, on the one hand if we talk about the mouth Eventually we will continue to be hurt by the very memory, on the other hand the memory of the hurt is within us and it is difficult to avoid it
consumer: ok
agent: It's not easy to talk about these things, I'm here
consumer: ok
What to talk about? I do not understand.
agent: About the fears and the hurt, if you want to continue talking I'm here
consumer: I've been through a few in my life
consumer: It's scary to trust people, especially men
agent: The difficulty of trusting men is understandable, especially when it comes to several vulnerabilities. Are there women in your life that you can lean on?
consumer: I don't know if they can be trusted
agent: The question is whether the difficulty is trusting people who won't hurt you or who won't keep your secret
consumer: That they don't underestimate me
agent: It sounds like you're scared too brother Rim will blame you
consumer: not only
consumer: That they don't take me seriously
agent: And let them dwarf your pain
consumer: true
agent: It can be a very humiliating and paralyzing feeling. A bit reminiscent of the experience of being hurt in some ways
consumer: true
agent: Sometimes one person (family member, friend, professional) is enough to listen and see your pain. This can be a first step in rebuilding trust in the people around you
consumer: maybe really but who
agent: If it's a professional woman, it's easier to search, if it's a person close to you, only you can think about who it will be. Sometimes it can take time, but once you start thinking about it, it's the beginning of a process
consumer: I understand, thanks
agent: nothing to do with it. you are invited Always contact us to talk about everything you feel
consumer: Thank you very much
consumer: Have a good day

agent: Option 1 is to contact the multidisciplinary treatment center that provides treatment at no cost to victims of sexual assault. The downside is that there are very long waiting lists. agent: Option 2 is subsidized treatment through Kopf. I'm sending you a link with details regarding treatment options at the Maccabi hospital

agent: Option 4 is treatment at the assistance center by female students specializing in the field as part of a practicum. consumer: Hello
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hello, I'm here for you. You are welcome to come back to us.
consumer: Can I write?
Agent: Yes, of course. I'm here.
consumer: I'm a little unsure how to proceed
how to let go
agent: The difficulty is completely understandable. Maybe you can start with small and non-threatening things. Maybe something that you would like to share, something that is bothering you, maybe the day you decided to contact... anything that suits you to start with...
consumer: I caught my partner (of course I haven't seen him since) taking pictures of me without my knowledge
He actually planned it and checked that the camera worked and everything
And after he took a picture and I caught him, he tried to play in my head that I'm just paranoid and has no idea what I'm talking about and that I need to More confident in him
consumer: It's been about 7 months since then, which is more or less the same time we dated
And it still hurts
consumer: And it hurts him less that he moved on so easily and is already dating someone else, it turns out very quickly after what happened
And it boils down to the fact that the offending party has continued to have fun and the offended party is stuck
consumer: I have blood evidence to go to the police
Or to warn his girlfriend
But I don't do anything
consumer: I don't want to get stuck on revenge, but it's also not right that he just lives his life and everything is fine for him
consumer: drives me crazy
I would appreciate advice on what to do
consumer: I only write songs and I don't have the courage to publish them either
agent: You describe a very difficult experience of breach of trust. An event that left you With a lot of frustration and pain, that you feel you have nowhere to channel it.
consumer: I don't live in a movie
It's illegal right??
A person must not take pictures of me without my knowledge, certainly not in an intimate and sexual situation
consumer: Can I file a complaint about this?
consumer: I feel that sometimes I might be wrong
agent: You are asking for my advice, but it seems to me that in a way that is probably more natural for you, you chose to write poetry, and this is a possibility that sounds very right and suitable for you to get something out of the frustration you are experiencing.
consumer: It's not okay that I didn't go to complain
It's not okay that I do want to complain
consumer: Yes, but do you release it from the system?
Stop thinking about him and what he did
And that he moves on easily and you didn't tell him what he left with me
Agent: You I really didn't live in the movie. It's definitely not appropriate, and as far as I know it's illegal to photograph someone without their knowledge and consent, certainly not in an intimate situation that clearly requires consent.
consumer: But you don't know for sure that it's illegal?
agent: I don't know if all the details are against the law. But there is a law of individual modesty that refines a person's permission to take a photograph that must be intimate, and certainly if it is done with the individual's permission. One phone call to the police and they will answer you, without you filing another complaint. You can check with them first, there is also the option of finding out details for you through the helpline's legal advice. In addition, if it was also an intimate photo and you suspect that he is going to use it, then it also borders on sexual harassment.
agent: Regarding the feelings Q L I'm not okay that I didn't go to complain or I'm not okay that I want to complain. I don't think it's right for you to be harsh with yourself and judge yourself like that. You had a very unpleasant and very frustrating experience, because you probably also felt powerless in the face of the situation. I would like to recommend you not to judge yourself and give yourself the space to think what suits you best. Give yourself the time to see what will heal you, calm you down and act accordingly.
agent: I hope I didn't say anything that makes it difficult for you, and if you want to think more together I'm here.
consumer: It's absolutely sexual harassment, isn't it?
I don't understand why it is doubtful
agent: The doubt is only about what the law defines in the matter and not about what you went through. I'm not completely knowledgeable and don't want to mislead. If you want, you can and ask the legal advice on the line and get a more learned and accurate answer.
consumer: I would love to
agent: I will pass on the details you provided and will you agree and if she has more questions or alternatively a clear answer for you that she will call you back?
agent: Regardless of the clarification required here, what the law says in relation to the case that happened. I want to say that I'm sorry for this event you went through and the difficult feelings that accompany it, which are completely sexual harassment, we will try to help as much as possible. And it is also important for me to say that if you decide to file a complaint, you can also receive an escort to the police.
agent: sorry I couldn't get your response. I have to finish. Have a good night and hope that, as you wrote above, it's okay that they get back to you.

consumer: שלום וברכה אדוני הנכבד והיקר שכולו עם לב טוב!
אני בחור מוגבל פיזית מסוג CP, שיתוק מוחין, שמקליד לך את המכתב הזה בעזרת האף שלי.
אני לומד בישיבת משי שנמצאת ברמת שלמה בירושלים, הישיבה היא - ישיבה לחינוך מיוחד עם רמה קוגניטיבית תקינה, לגילאי הבגרות עד גיל 21.
אני מתקשר בהתכתבויות כי אין לי דיבור ברור.
אני למדתי במשך כ10 שנים בתלמוד תורה רגיל לכל דבר ועניין, תלמוד תורה רוממה בכניסה לעיר, עד כיתה ח.
ואז התחלתי לחפש ישיבה של חברה רגילה שתסכים לקבל אותי, אך לצערי כל ישיבה בתורה עשתה פרצוף משלה.
וכך נאלצתי ללכת לישיבת משי, שהיא ישיבה לחינוך מיוחד. השנה הראשונה עברה עליי יחסית בסדר אך מאז התחיל לעציק לי החסר מהחברה הרגילה, וכך מצב רוחי התחיל להדרדר.
כך עברו להן שלושת השנים של ישיבה קטנה, שבהן הגעגועים רק הלכו הלכו והתגברו, ובמיוחד לחברי היקר והאהוב ביותר של נפשי אשר מי שמכיר אותי מכיר.
ואז זה קרה, בהופעה שנוכחתי בה נכח החבר האגדי הזה, לאחר שעליתי לבמה הוא זיהה אותי וכך נפגשנו לאחר עוד כמה פעמים בודדות שנפגשנו בשלוש השנים האלו.
באותו הוא בישר לי את הבשורה הטובה שבעזה הוא יתחיל בחודש אלול הקודם בישיבה גדולה אשר נמצאת בשכונה שאני לומד ונמצא במשך רוב היום.
אני שמחתי והתרגשתי עד הגג, שהנה סוף סוף האחדות חוזרת להתאחות.
וכך בשנה האחרונה הוא הגיע אליי הרבה הרבה וזה ממש ממש החייאה את רוחי.
הוא נכנס בזמנו לישיבה שבה למד גיסי, והוא - גיסי לא הפסיק לספר לי שיש שמה רב\משגיח אשר לא הפסיק למרר ולאמלל אותו ואת הבחורים הנוספים.
כמו לדוגמא - היה שולח אותו הביתה כל יומיים אם לא כל יום, או שהיה מדבר על נפשו שלא צא ממנו כלום וכו וכו וכו.
7
היום (11 ליולי) לאחר שנפרדתי מחברי היקר והאהוב בפתח הישיבה המדוברת, פגש אותי חבר נוסף אשר לומד גם הוא באותה ישיבה.
וכך, התגברתי על בושתי בדיבור הלא ברור שלי ופתחתי איתו בשיחה שנמשכה למעלה מחצי שעה,
בהתחלה על אה ועל דא, ואז בגלל שאני יודע עד כמה בחורי הישיבה שונאים כפשוטו את ראש הישיה וגם את אחיו שהוא הוא הרב\המנהל המדובר, משכתי אותו לשם כדי שיספר לי מה קורה איתם באמת.
וכך במשך כרבע שעה אם לא יותר הוא מפר לי מה עוברים עם המנהלים הללו
לדוגמא: מלטף ונגע בבורים בלי קשר מצב. 
ישנו בחור בישיבה שקצ מתחתך ונראה יפה ומסודר, ליל שבת אחד ראש הישיבה דרש בבית המדרש והרב-אחיו ואותו בחור שנראה יפה נוכחו במקום, לאחר כמה דקות קם אותו רב ניגש אל הבחור ואמר לו אני כרגע יוצא מבית המדרש, אתה יודע למה?! כי אני חושש שמא לא אעמוד בניסיון...
יושב עם בחורים לשיחה ואמר לנפש שלהם מה יצא ממך? למה אתה חי בכלל
בערב לג לעומר האחרון הודיעו לבחורים שאין אישור מצד ההנהלה לבחורי הישיבה לצאת למירון, כמה וכמה בחורים לא עמדו בניסיון וכן נסעו. לאחר שחזרו כל צוות הישיבה כולל ראש הישיבה אמרו פה אחד שלא לעשות להם כלום, בא אותו רשע והכריח את ראש הישיבה להורות לכל הבחורים שנסעו שיסתלקו מהישיבה עד חג השבועות, וכך היה. כל הבחורים שנסעו לא הגיעו לישיבה למעלה משבועיים.
אני שומע את הסיפורים הללו ונקרע לי הלב!
למה, למה בחורי הישיבה האלה בכלל והחברים שלי בפרט צריכים לסבול ולהתאמלל תחת אותו איש צוות אכזר ואולי גם עובריין בפרט ועוד כמה וכמה אנשי צוות בכלל???

נפרדתי ממנו בברכת הצלחה, והבטחתי לעצמי שבזה אני חייב לטפל עד שהאמת תצא לאור והוא כן הוא ישב בכלא.
דרך אגב, גיסי היקר אומר לי פעם אחר פעם שאם יגידו לו שאותו אחד יושב בכלא, הוא ממש לא התפלא אלא להיפך ישמח ויודה לה.
אני מכיר את הבנאדם מקרוב, הוא נראה צדיק וחסיד אבל מידותיו רעות ואכזריות שאין לתאר ואין לשער.
אבקש ואתחנן שלא תעשו מעשים ופעולות נגדו או נגד הישיבה לפני שתשאלו אותי, כי בי שזה יפגע אין לי שום בעיה, אבל שזה יפגע חו בחריי האהוביי אני לא מוכן 
אנא! אני ממש מתחנן אליך שתתייחס אליי!!!
ממתין לתגובה,
הרבה הצלחה!
והמשך יום נעים.
חיים אלחנן עידאן.
consumer: זה נטו מתוך כאב לשמוע את הסיפורים וחשק עז לעזור ולהואיל כמה שיותר....
consumer: מה שלומך איש יקר ואהוב?
כמה אני משגע אותך מ1 עד 10?

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: I am a physically disabled guy who has trouble speaking clearly,
Therefore, I will ask you to get back to me on this WhatsApp.
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: Good evening and good luck to you!
consumer: First of all, thank you very much for your reference
agent: What can I help you with?
consumer: I can share with you the letter and some messages I wrote to the ultra-orthodox minister of education, and can you tell me who I can contact?
agent: I'm here with whatever you choose
consumer: Peace and blessings, honorable and dear sir who is all with a good heart!
I'm a physically disabled guy with CP, cerebral palsy, typing this letter to you with my nose.
I study at the Meshi yeshiva located in Ramat Shlomo in Jerusalem, the yeshiva is a special education yeshiva with a normal cognitive level E, for matriculation ages up to 21.
I communicate in correspondence because I do not have clear speech.
I studied for about 10 years in a normal Torah Talmud for all intents and purposes, an advanced Torah Talmud at the entrance to the city, up to the 8th grade.
Then I started looking for a yeshiva of a regular company that would agree to accept me, but unfortunately each Torah yeshiva made its own face.
And so I had to go to the Meshi yeshiva, which is a yeshiva for special education. The first year went relatively well for me, but since then the lack of normal company began to bother me, and thus my mood began to deteriorate.
Thus passed the three years of a small yeshiva, in which the longings only grew stronger and stronger, and especially for the dearest and most beloved friend of my soul whom those who know me know.
And then it happened, at a concert I attended in which friend Ha was present This Capricorn, after I went on stage he recognized me and that's how we met after a few more times we met in these three years.
At the same time he gave me the good news that in Gaza he would start the previous month of Elul in a large yeshiva which is in the neighborhood where I study and am there for most of the day.
I was happy and excited to the roof, that here at last unity returns to sisterhood.
And so in the last year he came to me a lot and it really, really revived my spirit.
At the time he entered the yeshiva where my brother-in-law studied, and he - my brother-in-law never stopped telling me that there was a rabbi/overseer there who never stopped making him and the other guys bitter and miserable.
Like for example - he would send him home every two days if not every day, or he would talk about his soul that nothing came out of him, etc., etc. and.
7
Today (July 11) after I said goodbye to my dear and beloved friend at the entrance of the yeshiva in question, I was met by another friend who also studies in the same yeshiva.
And so, I overcame my shame in my unclear speech and started a conversation with him that lasted over half an hour,
At first about Ah and Da, then because I know how much the Yeshiva boys literally hate the head of the yeshiva and also his brother who is the rabbi/administrator in question, I dragged him there so that he would tell me what was really going on with them.
And so for about a quarter of an hour, if not more, he tells me what is going on with these managers
For example: stroking and touching the holes regardless of the situation.
There is a guy in the yeshiva who is just below you and looks nice and tidy, one Shabbat night the head of the yeshiva was preaching in the beit midrash and his rabbi and that nice looking guy were present On the spot, after a few minutes, the same rabbi got up, approached the guy and said to him, "I am currently leaving the Beit Midrash, do you know why?" Because I'm afraid I won't stand the test...
Sitting with guys for a conversation and said to their soul what came out of you? why are you even alive
On the eve of the last Omer, the boys were informed that there was no permission from the management for the Yeshiva's boys to go to Miron, several boys failed the test and went anyway. After all the yeshiva staff returned, including the head of the yeshiva, they unanimously said not to do anything to them, that evil one came and forced the head of the yeshiva to order all the young men who had traveled to leave the yeshiva until Shavuot, and so it was. All the guys who traveled did not come to the yeshiva for over two weeks.
I hear these stories and my heart breaks!
Why, why guys? This yeshiva in general and my friends in particular have to suffer and be miserable under that cruel staff member and maybe also a felon in particular and how many other staff members in general???

I said goodbye to him with a blessing of success, and promised myself that I must take care of this until the truth comes out and he did, he sat in prison.
By the way, my dear brother-in-law tells me time and time again that if he was told that the same person was in prison, he would not be surprised, but on the contrary would be happy and thank her.
I know the man closely, he seems righteous and devout, but his behavior is unspeakable and unimaginable cruelty.
I will ask and beg you not to take actions and actions against him or against the Yeshiva before you ask me, because I have no problem if it hurts me, but if it hurts my beloved choices I am not ready
please! I'm really from I beg you to treat me!!!
waiting for a response,
A lot of success!
And have a nice day.
Haim Elchanan Aidan.
consumer: It was purely out of pain to hear the stories and a strong desire to help and lend as much as possible....
consumer: How are you dear and beloved man?
How much do I drive you from 1 to 10?
Can you please reassure me that this is in real treatment?
It's just that about two weeks ago, my sister gave birth, and her husband, from whom I had heard several stories until then, never ceases to provide me with more and more stories about this depraved person....in the name of Asher Avraham
consumer: today he told me about all kinds of other disgusting and even sexual statements by this man.
For example, you probably know Yehuda Cohen, the grandson of Rabbi Yehuda Cohen, Aryeh Deri's advisor,
So he Lm D. With my brother-in-law in the same class under the same invigilator named Asher Avraham, in some situation that Yehuda got into with that person, this man threatened him that if he didn't.... then he would strip him of all his clothes in front of everyone in the Beit Midrash...
Does it make sense to you???
agent: You are talking about very difficult things that are done in a yeshiva
agent: It is very important to contact and warn
consumer: to whom?
agent: For those you wrote above, you can also consult with someone from the Yeshiva whom you believe and trust
agent: In addition, there is a line for religious men 02-5328000, which you can talk to
consumer: They don't have WhatsApp...
consumer: You don't handle things like that, I understand, right?
agent: We are here to provide assistance and emotional response. The things you bring up are very painful and difficult. There are many approx And to see them and tell about them, so that they don't remain a secret and more people get hurt.
agent: welcome to contact again whenever you feel the need to do so

מהמשחקים בין הבנות בכיתה? אורטל, ליאל.. הפורנוגרפיה.
שליו שנישק באוהל, ואז קרא לצד שם ידיים על השדיים וכל החברה צחקו.. ואז בשוק.. הכניס את האצבע שלו וזה כאב מזל שהפסיק.. ואז לקח את היד שלי ודחף לו לתחתונים. 
אבישי שהגיע אליי הביתה ואפילו פרשנו מגבת והוא אמר שהוא לא מסוגל- איזו גבורה, ברוך ה שיש גם כאלה.. אבל כן אונן עליי וגמר. זה היה דוחה. ונפגשתי איתו עוד פעם אבל זה כזה מעורפל.. כל כך קטנה. בת 11 
מעניין מה היה עם החבורה באותם ימים אני כבר לא זוכרת.. הכל נמחק.. עד גיל 12 שחוזרת למשחק. 
יאיר מאור מי עוד היה שם אני כבר לא זוכרת.. טוביה באיזה שהוא שלב.. 
ואז יאיר מתי התחלנו להסתובב לבד.. 
שמתי עליו ראש אני זוכרת. הייתי בטוחה שהוא הרבה יותר גדול. 
ישבנו שם במקלט בחדר ספורט של האולפנית.. היו שם את החלונות האלה והוא עלה לשם ואמר לי לבוא. הבטן רעדה אבל הלכתי.. כי זה היה נחמד שיש מישהו שאנחנו רק שנינו ביחד. 
הוא נישק אותי. שאל אם זה נעים.. הסיגריות שרפו לי בגרון אבל אמרתי שכן. אז הוא נישק יותר חזק ואינטנסיבי. ידעתי שזה יחמיר. 
אני לא זוכרת כבר איך הגענו לסיטואציה הראשונה. כשהוא מנסה להושיב אותי עם הגב אליו ולהיכנס וזה כואב כואב כואב ואני לא מסוגלת ואני אומרת לו די והוא אומר הנה הנה עוד קצת ואני לא עומדת בכאב. 
יוצאת משם עם רגליים רועדות כתמי דם על החולצה.. אלה שם והדר. מעניין אם הן זוכרות, כמה הן ראו. 
ואז הסרט קופץ אליו לחדר. שוב. מנסה נכנס לא מצליח.. זה כואב אני מבקשת די והוא אומר הנה הנה אני מצליח מתאמץ. קורע אותי. ונכנס עמוק אני מבינה שזהו. הוא הצליח. הוא זז בפנים ויוצא. הפין שלו מלא דם, מלא. אני חושבת שאולי אני ימות. זו לא הכמות שמדברים עליה.. מעיזה להסתכל גם אני בתוך שלולית של דם. מבקשת ממנו משהו להתנקות הוא מביא סדין מגעיל אני מפחדת להשתמש בו אבל אין לי ברירה.. מעבירה ואז יוצא דם אדום סמיך עם קרום עליו- עבה. ברור שכאב.. 
יאיר מסתכל מעקם פרצוף איכס וצוחק.אני מחייכת גם. הלב שלי שבור.. כל כך כואב לי. 
וככה עשרות פעמים.. אני הולכת ליאיר הוא עושה מה שרוצה. מתישהו גם אני מתחילה להנות. הוא לומד מה נעים לי, אני אפילו מגיעה לאורגזמות. 
אבל הוא מנצל את זה לוקח הכל. 
אני לא מספיק להגיע והידיים שלו עליי בכל מקום דורשות אותי תובעות לעצמו. 
מעולם לא שאל מה את רוצה, זה בסדר.. 
יום אחד נכנסתי לבית שלו הוא אפילו לא סגר את הדלת. תוך שניות הייתי בלי תחתונים והידיים שלו בפנים.. האצבעות שלו נכנסות עמוק. הישבן שלי חשוף מול הדלת הפתוחה.. 
הוא מרים אותי לחדר שלו ונכנס חזק לבפנים הוא בכלל לא רואה אותי לפעמים זה כואב מבהיל.. והוא ממשיך אני מנסה לבקש לאט.. יאיר לאט.. והוא ממשיך הוא אומר לי אני לא יכול.. אני לא מסוגל.. 
הפעמים שאבא שלו נכנס.. כמה הדחקתי את זה. את הדקות הארוכות שהדלת נותרה פתוחה והוא שם מסתכל.. עד שיאיר שם לב וצורח עליו.. 
הוא היה אוהב לעשות את זה במקומות הזויים- על השולחן סנוקר במתנס, על הרצפה בין המגרש למתנס, באולפנית בחדר המורים. אני כל כך פחדתי שמישהו יראה.. שיתפסו אותנו.. 
זה היה משפיל. מביך. 
כשפעם בא לבקר במדא ויצאנו לבחוץ לדבר ותוך שניות הפה שלו על שלי הידיים שלו נכנסות למכנסיים שלי לתחתונים, מתחת לחולצה.. אני בשוק אני לא מספיקה להגיב.. כמו טורף. כל כך מפחדת.. ובני בא מעניין כמה הוא ראה. 
והפעם ההיא.. שאמרה הכל.. שחיזקה מה שידעתי אני החלשה, אני נפגעת, הוא מנצל אותי. כשהוא הכניס את איבר המין לפה שלי והתחיל לנוע בהתחלה לאט ואז הגביר את הקצב וזה היה לי יותר מדי וממש ניסיתי לדחוף אותו. ניסיתי להתחמק ניסיתי להוציא אותו ממני והוא ממשיך מחזיק את הראש שלי בכוח לא נותן לי לזוז אני לא יכולה לדבר אני לא יכולה לצעוק לא יאיר לא. והוא גומר לי בפה זה עושה לי ריפלקס הקאה אני עומדת להקיא והוא צועק עליי לא לא אני מחזיקה בכוח והוא צוחק.. מה? מגעיל? 
ואני אומרת לו דוחה.. 
איך כל פעם אוזרת כוחות נפרדת ממנו וחוזרת.. 
חוזרת להיפגע. 
ובהפסקה יש את עומר. אבל איתו באמת הסכמתי ילדה בת 14 כבר ותיקה כבר יודעת מה זה למה לא בעצם.. הוא מלמד אותי מתמטיקה אני חייבת לו.. והוא היחיד שאני זוכרת גם את המגע בין השדיים.. בכל השאר זה כאילו נמחק. בטוח היה. כמה חורים שחורים. איך אפשר לזכור כל כך הרבה.. 
הוא הכניס את הפין שלו בין השדיים שלו. ואז נכנס לבפנים. אמא שלו הגיעה אז הוא מיהר לצאת אבל הספיק לגמור. בפעם השנייה גם אבל הפעם ממש הספיק לגמור בפנים. אני בהריון. ידעתי. אולי זו התקווה שלי. אולי זה מה שיציל אותי. ככה אני אפסיק להיפגע. 
לילה לבן בסניף. אנחנו נפגשים ליד פיצה שלי הוא מוצא מקום בין השיחים ברור שאפשר לראות אותנו ואומר אל תדאגי זה יהיה מהר הפעם שם קונדום. אני על שש הברכיים שלי נשרטות מהאדמה. זה לא נעים לי שיסיים מהר.. אני בהריון באותו יום עושה בדיקה אולי זו הפעם האחרונה שזה קורה. 
בת 14 בהריון. אני כבר לא מזדעזעת מזה.. זה הסיפור שלי.. אני כבר רגילה.. 
אמא מכריחה לעבור הפלה.. לחזור לאותו המקום, שיכולה להמשיך להיפגע. 
והקשר עם יאיר חוזר. עוד ועוד חוזרת בוכה. והולכת. כשכואב בגוף הנפש פחות מרגישה. 
כל כך הרבה פעמים זה בסדר נעים ואז הוא רוצה עוד אני לא יכולה והוא מתעלם. אני חייב הוא אומר.

consumer: Good afternoon.
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, you saw that you called when the line was inactive. Now I am with you.
consumer: Hi
I am the mother of a teenager who will soon be 16. I really have no idea when it happened, I was exposed to it not long ago.
The girl shared with me that on one of the outings with another friend of hers (who today they are not in touch with because of me), they are today in her friend's apartment, and together with them was another guy who was a few years older than her (a soldier I think) and they drank, which is not normal in my opinion, and in the meantime that she was drunk he forced himself on her even though she told him she didn't want to, it didn't matter to him and he continued on his way.
consumer: Since then she has been on a journey of self-destruction, trying to fix the unpleasant experience she had, trying to look for someone Let him love her and in the process of course you fall for those who all they want is to use her body and throw her away afterwards.
agent: First of all, it's good that you contacted us, it's definitely difficult to experience this as a mother, to stand on the sidelines and not know what to do.
consumer: Exactly.
As much as I try to talk to her and explain to her that this is not the way, and that in this way she is only doing more damage to herself and more mistakes and in the end it will end badly.... She seems to hear me and promises that she will not repeat it, but every time it happens again, and I am the one who is there When it happens to pick up the pieces, to wrap with love, with lots of conversations, but nothing helps. And I already feel that in all this I am already sinking together with her...
consumer: Her father and I are divorced.
The girl is there Only with me in the last year and she hardly communicates with her father. We have 2 more children, one at 18.5 automatically enlists and the other goes up to the 7th grade.
agent: You are describing a very natural situation of a victim who is unable to help herself and it is difficult for her to get help. Did you report it to any party? After all, she is a minor.
Consumer: No.
She does not want to.
She doesn't even know his name.
And she knows she doesn't have the mental strength to deal with it, with a legal process.
agent: I think it is very difficult for us as parents to help in these cases. Other therapeutic help is required here. As a mother, you are there to hug, love and be with her, but it is not a substitute for professional care. She went through something very traumatic and it is important to take care of her treatment. I can direct you to his place A. in which care is given to injured minors.
consumer: ok.

consumer: unfortunately

consumer: I pray that they accept me, I really don't want a hospital

consumer: So I'm so afraid that they won't agree again

consumer: not agreed for some stupid reason
consumer: I meet their criteria
agent: So that's good... what about the suitcase

agent: or the expectation

consumer: I need to come with a suitcase. Yes.
consumer: I didn't have it neither when I was accepted nor when I was not accepted

consumer: I just need it so badly. really.
consumer: I'm so on edge
consumer: The mind already affects everything
consumer: nightmares at night and waking up, worsening of the physical pain I have

consumer: Just tell about the current situation
consumer: to transfer the distress

agent: It's very reasonable, to hold the adversity alongside the hope and the desire to get back on track with your life
agent: We don't know what a basket is And to your smile
consumer: Consider?

consumer: eh..
consumer: Listen, it's the truth

consumer: I just need to gather strength, I need more intensive treatment for a few weeks, more wrapping
agent: And what will tell you that you are on the right path
consumer: first of all go in there.

consumer: yes ..
consumer: I'm afraid not to sleep tonight
agent: You may not second or you may be so Tired of the new mind, it's tiring to do something new, to enter the process
agent: The shift is about to end and maybe you don't need me anymore at this hour. I'm glad you mobilized yourself for a new state or mind, which you packed even though it was difficult and hope this is your new beginning. Good luck on Monday, I'll be sure to think of you with positive energies.

consumer: Hi, I think I've been harassed for the second time and I don't know what to do
Consumer: Yes
Agent: Hi, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi, I don't know what to do
agent: You wrote that you think you were harassed a second time, would you like to share?
consumer: It was a late bus ride and there was a man there who got drunk, around the age of 35-40 maybe more, at some point he came to sit next to me and after a while he sat next to me and said a lot of things he grabbed my hand and tried to get closer every time.. I'm lucky it ended Thanks to someone who intervened and I moved to sit next to her, but mainly because this is the second time that happened to go out exactly 4 months after the first time, it strengthened and overwhelmed everything.. I keep thinking maybe it's my fault and why exactly it happened to me
agent: Many times in the case of harassment we feel guilty. It's a difficult and confusing feeling. In the end, the blame lies with the one who hurts and not with the victim
consumer: It just caused me a lot of confusion since then and discomfort in every situation, and strengthened a lot of other feelings for me and I don't even know how to tell this to my dad
agent: It sounds like you've been carrying this injury with you for a few months, it's very difficult, especially in front of people who are close to us
consumer: I happened to tell this to someone close but not to anyone in my family and I'm afraid that if I tell my father I don't know how he will react because I don't want to make him sad either
agent: You protect your father and that is understandable, but at the same time it is very important to share, especially the people Those close to us who can support us in such a difficult time
consumer: How can I start such a conversation?
agent: That's a good question. You have to remember that there is no shame here and it is not your fault that you got into the situation
consumer: right.. thanks
agent: It is important that you know that we are always here for you and your father is also welcome to contact us if he feels any difficulty. Many times we also receive inquiries from the immediate circle of the victims
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: Thank you for contacting us, feel free to write again when you feel the need
consumer: Thank you

consumer: Hello

agent: Good evening, I'm here now

consumer: I speak for my sister
consumer: She was raped unfortunately and I am looking for a place/psychologist for mental support
consumer: in face-to-face conversations once a week or once every two weeks
agent: Hi, first of all it is important for me to reflect that your sister is lucky that you are taking care of her. The fact that she shared her past rape with you indicates that she is probably able to trust you, which is not obvious.
consumer: Thank you very much
Right now I know she needs someone to give mental help to know how to deal with all the crises that the rape brings with it over the years
consumer: That's why I'm turning to you
agent: The aid centers in Israel are divided into according to geographical space. Each center has a coordinator, one of whose tasks is to help those who have been harmed, to find a therapist specializing in sexual abuse. You can dial 1202 and you will reach our volunteer. You can explain to her that you want to consult about treatment. You can also leave me a name and phone number and from which area your sister is, and I will ask that they get back to you or her.
consumer: I'm from Ashkelon
consumer: I'd rather they talk to me first
consumer: 0526614505
consumer: I would be happy if they get back to me as soon as possible

agent: And from which region is your sister? This is important because each sales coordinator handles a certain area.
consumer: Ashkelon too
consumer: My name is Dror
agent: perfectly fine. I will ask them to get back to you. If you need assistance and consultation, you are always welcome to use Well It is important for us to help everyone who supports the victims, it must be a difficult experience for you.
consumer: Yes, very difficult
Thank you
agent: I'm sorry for your sister who had to go through such a difficult experience and for you, that you have to experience the great difficulty she must have experienced.
consumer: Thank you very much, from here we will have to fight hard
Agent: That's right. You, and maybe those who are by her side in addition to her, are also entitled to support. Amor, allow yourselves, if necessary, to help us as well.
agent: I wish you and your sister to embark on a journey of healing. They will get back to you in the next few days. The assistance center of the lowland region is located in Rehovot.
consumer: Thank you very much

consumer: Thank you very much for the help

consumer: Hi
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, you contacted us in the morning. I'm here now, if you want.
consumer: Hello
Agent: Hello
consumer: What is the format here actually?
consumer: someone gave me your number
consumer: But I have no idea beyond that
agent: We are an assistance line for victims of sexual assault. You can share difficulties, consult, and whatever you need.
Consumer: Oh
consumer: ok
consumer: anonymous and this?
agent: Unfortunately, the WhatsApp line is not anonymous. The usual helplines - 1202, yes anonymous. Here I can see the phone number from which the call came and sometimes the name. We don't see your profile picture. It is important to emphasize that we are committed to maintaining confidentiality, therefore the details are Your phone number and the details of the conversation will remain confidential (except in cases of harm to minors and the helpless in which there is an obligation to report to the authorities in accordance with the law)
consumer: So there is no anonymity but there is confidentiality
Agent: That's right. The intention is that if we know the full name of the victim and she is a minor who was harmed by a person who is supposed to be responsible for her, we will have to assist and connect an external professional, if this is a case that requires mediation by a professional agency such as a social worker. As long as we don't know the personal details, we can give anonymous and discreet assistance.
consumer: I'm not a minor
consumer: So basically, with me, in any case, everything stays here
Agent: Very true. We are only here to provide assistance. If you are not a minor - then everything will also remain within the framework of the Si center and anonymously and discreetly.
consumer: The person who gave me your number told me that actually if they touched me or invaded my privacy without my consent, it is considered sexual assault, even if the other party had no sexual intention and they only wanted to harass me
consumer: is she right?
consumer: Because according to that I was sexually assaulted, but to call it sexual assault is just to inflate the story
agent: Your friend is quite right unfortunately.. the intention is not what is decisive. The question - what was the result, and above all - how did you feel. If you have had an experience of invasion and harm, then as far as we are concerned, you are harmed. There is of course a difference between legal definitions and the emotional and mental perception of the experience of sexual abuse.
consumer: So I was hurt
consumer: She also claims that this is why I do Today what I am doing.. what is called seems to me to be unhealthy sexual activity
consumer: She says that subconsciously - I'm trying to take control back into my hands
agent: First of all, I'm sorry to hear that someone allowed themselves to do things without your permission and without your consent. It must leave uneasy feelings in the soul, and it may be that as a result of this injury, there are unhealthy behaviors, it happens many times. Sort of trying to repair the damage - which only causes more damage.
consumer: And is this a direct and close relationship?
consumer: I mean, there's no way I'll be able to heal myself and stop doing this nonsense even without opening up what they did or didn't do to me?
agent: In order to understand your particular case, the best thing to do is to do Psalms One-on-one with a therapist who is an expert in the field of sexual abuse. In such a professional process, you can slowly understand what is going on in your mind, and understand what is related to what. This is also the best way we know to succeed in making a journey of healing that frees from the consequences of the injury.
consumer: I already have an emotional therapist
consumer: I don't think she is an expert in the field of sexual abuse
consumer: Do I need another nanny now?
agent: If you are already in treatment, it is worth sharing with the therapist the harm and the unhealthy sexual behaviors. Maybe she can work with you on it. If not, you can ask her for a recommendation for a therapist who specializes in sexual injuries. You will first have to go through the process of breaking up with this nanny, and then start a new treatment with Mo's nanny Mashed with sexual injuries. It is not possible to do 2 treatments at the same time. Even in the aid centers they know how to recommend specialist nurses all over the country.
consumer: She knows about all my unhealthy sexual behavior
consumer: But I don't agree to talk to her about the injury
consumer: It's hard for me
agent: Telling about an injury you have experienced is one of the most difficult challenges. We have every reason not to share. When it remains a secret, it's small and we control it. The fear of sharing is that we will lose control, that we will be blamed, that we will once again feel powerless and uncaring for the environment. But on the other hand, if you share with someone who is sensitive, and knows that sexual abuse is never the fault of the victim, but always the responsibility of the abuser, then the reaction of such a person, including the caregiver, will be For her to be very strengthening and part of the healing process..
consumer: I don't want to
consumer: I don't know why, I just don't want to talk about it
agent: What's important is that you only do what you want. And everything only at your own pace.
agent: If it doesn't suit you to talk about the injury - then no.
consumer: Ugh
consumer: But then the hurt will forever continue to rule me
agent: You can keep in touch with us. Here it is anonymous assistance as you understood. That should make it easier. Because you're anonymous and it's not an ongoing relationship with someone you know.
consumer: good
consumer: And how does it actually work here?

consumer: I was on vacation in New York, and Israel Blum, a student who studied with me at IDC, wanted to meet me at a restaurant. On the date he told me he was in New York because he works in real estate with his uncle
I met him about four months before he told me that his father died of cancer and entered my heart through a sad story
We were in a restaurant on a date and when we finished eating we went outside to the street and it was terribly cold and I was wearing a black mini dress. He offered me to eat ice cream and I told him it was really cold and that I would give up Ice cream and I really want to go to a party...
Israel told me that there is no problem and that we should go out but we have to choose a party... and it's cold outside and it's better that we go to him because he lives 5 minutes from the restaurant... He said that his apartment is two stories and I can stay in his apartment and it's a shame that I pay so much money for hotels....
While shivering I agreed to the offer. Huge mistake. And now I will explain why I was wrong-
Because when we got to the apartment Israel changed his mind. We sat on the second floor which was parterre (I had no reception) and he brought out a bottle of red wine and snacks. While the party app is open on my cell phone, Israel decided that he didn't want to go to the party today, he wanted to sleep with me. Tonight is the night for him and he grabbed my face and started kissing me aggressively
co nsumer: -there is a continuation-
consumer: When I broke free from his unpleasant kiss, I told him that I wasn't interested and that I wanted to go to a party and that I thought we would remain friends and it would be really nice if we went to a party together on Friday night in New York.. He told me you don't let me, so why should I take you? I told him that I go with men who invest in me and he wants to get everything easy and that's less me. And then he told me they invest in you? In short, you are a whore..
consumer: I told him no! Then he tried to convince me that I was a money whore….. and started humiliating me with curses that I better forget.
I told him a sentence that annoyed him very much - "If I didn't want you in Herzliya, I certainly wouldn't want you in New York."
Once I realized where this was going I tried to order an Uber Back to the hotel but I found out that there is no reception at his house. So I asked him to please take me back to my hotel from where you took it (it was night and we are in a very scary neighborhood in New York) I didn't know where I was and the feeling of fear and anxiety I went through in those moments - you can't explain in words...
I begged him to take me back. Only to bring me back...

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, I previously applied to receive assistance for a company that was sexually assaulted about a year ago. I would be happy if you get back to me
consumer: Thank you
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: I am applying for a company that was sexually assaulted about a year ago. She tried meeting with a psychologist through Maccabi but feels she doesn't understand her. Trying to help her find a caregiver through you so that she can enter into a conversation framework. Yael came back to me and said that there was an appointment for a treatment program in Jerusalem because we live in Oranit, I wanted to know if it was possible to find an appointment for a treatment program through you in the central area
agent: I understand, since the answer on WhatsApp is national, I am in the northern region, is Ornit in the Tel Aviv region? Fresh? I can send you from s phone number that you should contact for clarifications,
consumer: Yes, near Rosh Ha'Ein, Tel Aviv and Ra'anana it's perfectly fine, also the Sharon area and every block of Dan if possible..
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Ra'anana is 09-7747760.
Their email is: withu@1202sharon.org.il
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Tel Aviv is 03-5176176.
Their email is: Supervision@ta1202.org
agent: I congratulate you for wanting to help your company, it's not always easy
consumer: Tell me about it
agent: How are you in communication with your company?
consumer: not easy.. not an easy burden.. to support. With us it is more complex in the aspect of the relationship between us
agent: It's really not easy, one of the important things is as And be non-judgmental and non-critical and allow your girlfriend to make the decisions herself, even if you understand that it is not accurate/not in rhythm/not understandable to you... Why is it important to allow her to regain control of her life, at her own pace and with her own powers.
consumer: That's exactly what I told her..she kept it in for a whole year and didn't tell me..and after a year of telling me, it took her a while to say that she was ready to take care of herself..I explained to her that there are no shortcuts to deal with it and it would be better for her to open the issue with a professional who understands In another area, she will have triggers in her life that will cause the subject to float in an unfavorable context for her.. the path to healing requires confronting the initial difficulty even if it hurts.. there are no shortcuts in the matter of the soul.. there is no end and end.. she will have to Number of steps until healing. Even if it brings down and hurts mentally.. later there will be growth out of the pain
agent: It's very beautiful and impressive and of course what you said is true, but it's also very difficult and we can't always listen to logic and say - well, I'm ready - it can take time. Good thing she knows you're there for her
consumers:
agent: And it's also important that you keep your strength and you mentioned that it's complex.
consumer: Thanks for the reinforcements..I have yoga that helps and relaxes me
Agent: Excellent
agent: I wish you a quiet and peaceful night, and also strength to continue and you can always call to consult or ask or anything you need
consumer: Thanks for being willing to help, good to know. Good night

consumer: Good evening
I need to share feelings
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: My name is Shay.
I have bad feelings and thoughts
agent: Good evening Shai, I'm just changing with another volunteer, she will continue with you soon, okay?
consumer: okay
So wait for her to get back to me?
agent: Yes, just a few minutes
consumer: good thanks
agent: Good evening Xi, I'm here now. I understand that you have bad thoughts and feelings.
consumer: Good evening.
Right.
In addition to dealing with the injury, I also have trauma from the army, and every time there is a difficult security situation, everything is shaken for me
agent: Sounds logical and so complex
consumer: It doesn't make sense to live like this
agent: It doesn't make sense to have traumatic experiences. and all the implications and their later life. But it makes sense that when there is a trigger like a tense security situation - it raises the military trauma
consumer: It's painful and difficult that it's like this
agent: I'm really sorry for you. Sounds so difficult.
consumer: Can I share something with you?
Agent: Sure. whatever helps you
consumer: Basically, I have been in a therapeutic setting for two and a half years, but I still haven't opened the story of the sexual abuse I went through.
In January, my nanny went on maternity leave and she doesn't return until September.
Does it make sense that I feel dependent on her and even a kind of motherly figure?
agent: I'm not an expert in the field. Yes, I know that the relationship with a therapist should become significant and even simulate a relationship with figures close to us. But it sounds like you are a very sensitive and aware person , therefore, if this is what you feel - it is probably true. I believe it would also be right to share with the nanny when you return. It must be important for the therapeutic process.
consumer: But is it okay to feel this way?
agent: sounds so human. and significant. A bond is created that reminds you of a bond with your mother. I hope this means that she feels like a figure who protects you and that you can trust her. This is what should happen in therapy. And the matter of dependence - this is part of a close relationship. Later on in the treatment, it also sounds like it's worth talking about.
agent: Shay, my shift ends now. Would you like to continue chatting with the next volunteer?
agent: I understand that you are currently not available. If you want, you can contact us when you can. Have a calm evening

consumer: שלום

consumer: התכתבתי אתמול עם מישהי בווטסאפ הזה, סיפרתי לה בקצרה על המצב שלי והיא אמרה שהוא מורכב

agent: מה שאפשר לעשות זה לרשום אותך כמתעניינת וייצרו איתך כאשר יהיה מועד לפתיחת קבוצה
agent: כל עוסית זה בסדר
consumer: האם קיים איזשהו טיפול פרטני באזור חיפה או קבוצה מחוץ לחיפה?
agent: יכול להיות שניתן להרשם לקבוצה בכרמיאל זה יכול לענין אותך?
agent: עוד אופציה היא  אפשרות לקבל טיפול במרכז הסיוע ע”י סטודנטיות המתמחות בתחום במסגרת פרקטיקום. הטיפול בעלות סמלית של 50 ש”ח לפגישה.
נכון להיום  אין מקום פנוי לטיפול על ידי מתמחה, יפתחו עוד מקומות באוקטובר 23.
consumer: סביב אוקטובר אני אמורה לחזור ללימודים בתל אביב. האם קיימת קבוצה בתל אביב, כך שאולי אוכל לשלב אותה עם הלימודים?
consumer: אני לומדת באוניברסיטת תל אביב
agent: אני לא יודעת לענות על זה. אם זה בסדר לך אשאיר בקשה לרכזת שתבדוק ושיחזרו אליך. זה יכול לקחת כמה ימים
consumer: אין בעיה. אשמח אם לא תשכחו אותי
agent: לא נשכח. לפעמים בגלל עומס של פניות זה לוקח קצת יותר זמן. וגם אם לא נמצא משהו במיידי אפשר להרשם לקבוצה הבאה.
agent: המשמרת שלי מסתיימת עכשיו. כתבתי לרכזת את מה שדיברנו עליו וביקשתי שיבדקו לגבי תל אביב ויחזרו אליך. את מוזמנת לפנות אלינו מתי שתרצי גם בהמשך.
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
consumer: We corresponded yesterday, I asked about a regular support group in the Haifa area. I'd love to know what's going on with it
agent: Hi, my name is Zohar, I see that you are waiting for an answer regarding a support group in Haifa.
Consumer: Yes
agent: It is important to me that you know that, in general, participation in the group is conditional on receiving individual treatment and/or regular accompaniment by an attorney at the same time because content arises in the group that needs to be processed.
consumer: Yesterday I corresponded with someone on this WhatsApp, I told her briefly about my situation and she said it was complex
agent: According to what I'm checking, there is no group that is going to open soon in Haifa
consumer: Moss from the local authority, or can it also be Moss from my framework?
agent: What can be done is to register you as interested and They will create with you when there is a time to start a group
agent: whatever you try is fine
consumer: Is there any individual therapy in the Haifa area or a group outside of Haifa?
agent: It might be possible to register for a group in Karmiel, could this be of interest to you?
agent: Another option is the possibility of receiving treatment at the assistance center by female students specializing in the field as part of a practicum. The treatment has a nominal cost of NIS 50 per session.
As of today there is no available place for treatment by an intern, more places will open on October 23.
consumer: Around October I should return to studies in Tel Aviv. Is there a group in Tel Aviv, so maybe I can combine it with my studies?
consumer: I study at Tel Aviv University
agent: I don't know how to answer that It. If it's okay with you, I'll leave a request for the hub to check and get back to you. It may take a few days
consumer: No problem. I would be happy if you don't forget me
agent: we will not forget. Sometimes due to a load of inquiries it takes a little longer. And even if we don't find something right away, you can sign up for the next group.
agent: My shift ends now. I wrote to the coordinator what we talked about and asked them to check about Tel Aviv and get back to you. You are welcome to contact us whenever you want in the future as well.

consumer: הייתי מעדיפה שיהיו לי חבלות על כל הגוף, שאני אדמם, שאני אהיה צרודה מצרחות, שאני לפחות אדע שנאבקתי ונלחמתי וצרחתי, ככה לפחות לא הייתי מאשימה את עצמי, לא הייתי שונאת את עצמי, לא הייתי רוצה לקלף לעצמי את העור בשביל להפסיק להרגיש אותו ולהריח את הבושם שלו.
אבל זה היה דייט, אני אפילו התרגשתי קצת, הוא היה נראה לי, חתיך , חמוד, טוב, מעניין, עמוק, מצחיק, הייתי בטוחה שיהיה לנו ערב כיף וזהו.
שהתנשקנו, והיד שלו לאט לאט נכנסה לי מתחת לשמלה לכיוון התחתון, עצרתי את הנשיקה אחזתי לו ביד ואמרתי לו ,לא, הוא הסתכל אליי ואמר לי שהכל בסדר, עם חיוך קטן כזה, ונישק לי את הצוואר, ושוב התנשקנו, הפעם הייתי זהירה יותר ופשוט עצרתי לו את היד, אבל הוא לא התייחס , והוא המשיך לנשק אותי ולהכניס את היד עוד עוד, אמרתי לו שאני ממש לא רוצה, נישק ךי את הצוואר שוב ובבת אחת הכניס את היד מתחת לתחתון, עצרתי , אמרתי לו שאני לא רוצה אבל לא היה עם מי לדבר, הוא חזק ממני בהרבה, וגדול ממני בהרבה(גם את זה לא ידעתי עד לרגע האחרון ממש) זזתי, זה כאב לי ולא רציתי, לא ככה, ואז הבנתי שזה כבר לא רק האצבעות שלו, ממש זזתי וניסיתי להתנגד אבל הוא הכאיב לי כל כך וכל פעם שהצלחתי קצת להשתחרר ממנו הוא תפס אותי במותן ודחף אותי בחוזקה עליו, אז שתקתי כי הבנתי שככל שאני אזוז יותר ואתנגד יותר זה יכאב לי יותר, שתקתי ונתתי לו, נתתי לו לנשק אותי , נתתי לו לכפות את עצמו עליי, פשוט ניתקתי את עצמי מהגוף שלי כדי לא להרגיש, ושתקתי-כמו מטומטמת, הייתי צריכה לצרוח ולבעןט בו, למה נתתי לווווו??????????? ואז הוא החזיר אותי הביתה, כאילו כלום לא קרה, ולא רק זה, הוא יצא מהרכב כדי להביא לי את הגקט מהתא מטען ונישק אותי, כאילו אנחנו סתם זוג שנפרד....
שכתבתי לו מה הוא חשב שהוא המשיך למרות שאמרתי לא, הוא כתב שאני סוטת מין ושכפיתי את עצמי עליו, ושכנראה מרוב עונג אמרתי לא, כאב ליי!!!!! עדיין כואב לי קצת, איך אתה יכול להגיד שנהניתי???? ואיך לעזאזל אני, אניייייי, יכולה לכפות את עצמי עליךךךךך???? איייךךךךך??? אתה מבין את הפערי כוחות שיש לנווו??? אתה גבוה ממני, חזק ממני וכבד ממני? איך בחורה במשקל 50 קילו יכולה לכפות את עצמה על גבר בן 36? איךךך? 
עד שסוף סוף הסכמתי להאמין באהבה קיבלתי כזו סטירה, אולי באמת לא כדאי

והחרדות רק החמירו, החרדות האלו נוספו על מטען חרדות אחרות, וזה רק החמיר את המצב הנפשי שלי. 
בוודאות שאני גם סובלת מדיכאון כבר ארבע שנים, פשוט חייתי בהכחשה שהכל בסדר איתי. 
כל מקרה אונס, כל מקרה של הטרדות מיניות, מזעזע לי את הנפש. אני לא יכולה שלא להרגיש את מפלס החרדה עולה, והמחשבות שישר רצות לעבר מקומות אפלים. 
אז הסיפור שלי מתחיל בגיל 7, כשגבר זר החליט להטריד אותי מינית. לגעת בי, לנסות לחכך את איברו בשלי, ואז לאונן לי מול הפנים. 
אימי וסבתי ידעו, סיפרתי להן. אבל לא נעשה דבר. הן גם לא דיברו איתי על זה מעולם. 
וזהו, מאז אני סוחבת את זה איתי. 
בגיל 15 מישהי שמכיר אותי, ניצל את זה ששתיתי אלכוהול, והשכיב אותי. אני זוכרת שביקשתי שיפסיק ושאני לא רוצה ולא מוכנה, אבל לא היה מי שיקשיב לי באותו רגע. 
ואחרי זה, אחרי הפעם הראשונה, הרגשתי כאילו שוב חיללו אותי, ומשם זה עבר למצב בו אני מתרגשת מסקס ראשוני עם מישהו חדש. זה התחיל קצת לפני הצבא שהתחלתי להיות פרפרית ולרצות להיות כל פעם עם מישהו אחר. 
אז לא ייחסתי חשיבות באמת למה שאני עושה ובין מה שקרה לפני כן. 
רק כיום בדיעבד אני מבינה שהכל קשור. ושכל החיים סחבתי איתי מטען מאוד כבד, שעכשיו מתחיל להיות מעמסה ממש גדולה על הכתפיים שלי.

מסתובבים בינינו אנשים חולים שלא שולטים על עצמם.

agent: זה אף פעם לא מאוחר מדי להתחיל בטיפול ולעבד את הפגיעה שנעשתה. כל גיל הוא טוב כשאת מוכנה להתחיל.

consumer: Hi, so how do you actually start talking about it?
This is the first time I'm even opening this topic. It is very difficult and unusual to talk about it.
consumer: We have already gone through the initial procedure
Agent: Hi, I'm Ruth. I am with you now.
consumer: Hi, so how do you actually start talking about it?
This is the first time I'm even opening this topic. It is very difficult and unusual to talk about it.
agent: It's really not easy the first time. You can start wherever you like. I will listen to you in any way you choose.
agent: It might be easier to tell how you feel now
consumer: So 4 years ago when I became a mother for the first time, I started living with anxiety. About a lot of things, including the whole issue of sexual harassment and rape.
At first you did not attribute The importance of what happened to me in the past, because it was so long ago. But it didn't go away, and only got worse when I found out I was going to have a second daughter.
Then at that time there was the shocking rape in a settlement in the south, when a 10-year-old girl was raped in her bed while the parents were in a room next door.
And the anxieties only got worse, these anxieties were added on top of other anxieties, and it only worsened my mental state.
For sure I have also been suffering from depression for four years now, I just lived in denial that everything was fine with me.
Every case of rape, every case of sexual harassment, shocks my soul. I can't help but feel the anxiety level rising, and the thoughts are running straight to dark places.
So my story begins at the age of 7, when a strange man decided to sexually harass me. Touch me, try to rub a member And in mine, then masturbate in front of my face.
My mother and grandmother knew, I told them. But nothing was done. They never talked to me about it either.
And that's it, I've been carrying it with me ever since.
At the age of 15, someone who knows me, took advantage of the fact that I drank alcohol, and laid me down. I remember asking him to stop and that I didn't want to and wasn't ready, but there was no one to listen to me at that moment.
And after that, after the first time, I felt as if I had been violated again, and from there it moved to a situation where I am excited about initial sex with someone new. It started a little before the army that I started to be a butterfly and want to be with someone else every time.
So I didn't really attach importance to what I was doing and what happened before.
Only today in retrospect do I understand that everything is connected. and the whole of life I was carrying a very heavy load with me, which is now starting to be a really big burden on my shoulders.
agent: Sounds like a very difficult load to carry
consumer: I remember what sexual situations I was in as a girl, and I understand that everything that happened is not normal, and it shouldn't have happened if my soul hadn't been hurt at such a young age.
I was fearless and unrestrained when it came to sex.
I was also almost not emotionally attached to any of them. The vast majority of them were just, like toys for me.
agent: Injuries at such a young age affect life
consumer: Now at the age of 31 I understand it unfortunately
agent: You understand that there is a connection between the things
consumer: I didn't open it in front of my husband.
But I'll have to open soon, because it's already time The fact that I really shy away from him touching me for nothing.
I started to get angry with him when he does it but not to explain to him why. And it would just create fights.
We have been together for 8.5 years, where did I suddenly fall for him that I don't want his touch?
consumer: From someone who is very open sexually, I became a very closed and non-sexual woman.
I don't want anything, I want to sleep. I don't want to be touched in any way or way.
In general, I started shying away from touch and hugs from others. And it used to be a part of me.
agent: It sounds like you understand that damage from childhood and behavior from adolescence affects you today. Everything floats and rises. It also affects the ability to be intimate with your partner.
consumer: In addition, when I'm with my girls somewhere, and a man walks by us, Every man, I immediately go into dark thoughts - he and anyone who passes by can be a harasser or a rapist or a pedophile.
I'm scared for my daughters when they grow up. Actually in today's reality it can happen at any age.
There are sick people walking among us who are not in control of themselves.
consumer: I'm waiting for an appointment with a psychiatrist. And after that, of course, I will need emotional therapy, the problem is that there are quite a few emotional layers that need to be addressed. I don't even know where to start.
It all started in childhood, and of course remains etched in my memory. The faces, the names, and the things done (not only related to sexual abuse)
agent: It sounds like you are alone with your thoughts and fears.
agent: You rallied your forces and asked for help.
agent: You express awareness of your situation, the trauma you went through and the consequences had it in adolescence and now. You tell about the way you choose to deal with it.
consumer: I am very aware today, although I know that it is better for the process to happen sometime late than never.
But I'm also afraid that this baggage I'm carrying with me has already emotionally damaged my daughters and my husband.
The depression and anxiety don't allow me to be the mother I wanted or the woman I wanted to be.
I'm like an emotionless robot. very angry I get very angry at the most devilish and silly things.
consumer: the smallest and stupidest*
agent: The feelings you describe are very typical of women who have been sexually assaulted.
consumer: And now that I want to take care of myself, the wait for each turn is so long. And this only adds to the frustration and the physical difficulty the mental
consumer: In addition to the one you talked about at the beginning of the conversation.
I'm alone most of the week too. My husband is permanent, in a closed base. Sometimes it only comes out once a week.
Right now he closes Shabbat.
And we are far from the families. So I'm really really alone.
consumer: He has also been in Nablus a lot on behalf of his new position lately. Which increased all the anxieties.
agent: Waiting for treatment is not easy. When you already want and are ready, it is very frustrating to wait. Especially when you are alone a lot.
agent: It's never too late to start treatment and process the damage done. Any age is good when you are ready to start.
consumer: Beit Maslan is in Be'er Sheva.
And I have been donating clothes there for several years. Even before I became a mother.
How strange, that at the end I will turn to you for real help. It was always there in front of my eyes. The words below the sign, the meaning of the main boxes.
I haven't considered it before. And now it meets me in the most powerful way.
consumer: And how do you survive the wait between treatments?
agent: contact with us can certainly help with the wait. You are welcome to contact us at any time you choose. Both on WhatsApp and on the phone line that is available 24/7.
agent: Beit Maslan is a place you can turn to for advice and information about additional treatment options.
consumer: Do you have face-to-face consultation?
Do you have emotional therapists?
Or is it all online only?
agent: The WhatsApp line is national. You should contact the nearest assistance center and check what their options are Regarding counseling or emotional therapy. May I ask what part of the country you are from?
consumer: I'm from Be'er Sheva
agent: Maslan's direct phone number (assistance center for victims and victims of sexual assault and violence Negev Beer Sheva) is 08-6421313.
Their email is: siyua@maslan.org.il
agent: In addition - you can call 1202 at any hour.
consumer: Before I contacted you on WhatsApp, it turned out that I contacted an organization for sexually abused women, something else. There they told me that there is a waiting list of between one and two years - until receiving an initial frontal consultation.
It's really sad to have to wait so long. This is not a realistic time at all for treatment.
agent: You are very right. Sad that this is the reality. In any case, the phone line or WhatsApp can help until something is resolved M.
agent: Is there anything else you'd like to discuss?
agent: The shift is about to end. I understand that you cannot continue chatting right now and I am saying goodbye to you. I wish you a pleasant evening.
