transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello,
A month and a half ago I experienced an assault / sexual harassment - mild -
It happened at the gym-
in the sauna-
The attacker undressed and started masturbating in my presence.
Although he stopped the act after I refused.
But no apology or regret after conversation.
I am debating what to do about it.
I would love to consult.
Best regards,
Jonathan
agent: Hello Yonatan, I'm Liat, the situation you described is not an easy experience, it should not be underestimated
consumer: Thank you Liat-
I'm still trying to figure out how to deal with what happened
consumer: A friend I shared made it clear to me that what happened to me was an assault and not harassment - then I decided to take action -
and at least consult
consumer: Why should you do it?
agent: It's good that you contacted us. It's a confusing situation, he stopped but didn't Take advantage and leave you with an unpleasant feeling
consumer: Although the attacker - presented himself as someone normative - and me as someone who sent him all the signs that would allow him to do what he did,
But in the end I felt he was manipulative - lacking any sense of remorse.
And I have no doubt that if it happened to me, it will happen to others who may find it more difficult to defend themselves.
consumer: I know the day and time it happened. It happened at a gym so they have surveillance and pictures of people
- I'm debating what to do.
consumer: Thanks for the assistance
agent: It's good that you were able to stand your ground in the face of his manipulation. You can of course contact the gym management, photos are usually not kept for long. Even if they didn't know for sure who he was, it could be that he was And previous complaints or there will be complaints in the future, and there is a meaning to such a request from you
consumer: And what about the police and the justice system? Is it right to file a police complaint?
consumer: Is a gym obliged to take such a complaint seriously?
consumer: They have a record of the phone numbers - of the subscribers who were on that day. The pictures are in the database
agent: The police won't be able to do much until they know who it is. You can try to find out at the gym who it is and then contact the police, or contact the police and hope they do this check in front of the gym
agent: I understood now that you don't mean surveillance cameras but pictures of the subscribers and who was there at the time
consumer: For me as a complainant - is the move worth it? am I Is it helpful to others?
Also: 1. As a complainer at the gym
2. Complaint to the police
The answer should be different according to 1 and 2.
consumer: For me it's about revenge. Disconnection of the feeling of helplessness.
Restore respect.
And maybe a receipt of the unused subscription fees since I stopped going there.
But is there a social/moral value to the complaint? A chance to prevent this for that person in the future?
agent: A complaint at the gym can lead to his removal from the gym (and to receive information for contacting the police). A complaint to the police is intended to lead to a criminal investigation. The considerations you mentioned of feeling revenge, reducing the feeling of helplessness and restoring dignity are very important, no less important than the possibility of preventing harm to others
consumer: Thanks for the support and confirmation.
I am I will contact the club after consulting with other close people. and professional.
Could you please direct me - to a counseling center where I can meet with someone for a face-to-face consultation - if I need it later?
agent: There is a possibility of an assistance meeting with us at the assistance centers for victims of sexual assault. What region of the country are you from?
consumer: Tel Aviv
agent: The assistance here on WhatsApp is national and I'm from the north. If and when you want a meeting, I suggest you call 1202 or 1203 (helpline for men) and you can coordinate there
consumer: Great.
Thank you very much for the support and conversation.
Much gratitude to have someone to talk to
agent: Filing a complaint with the police is sometimes a difficult experience for which you need to prepare emotionally. If you decide to file a complaint, you can apply that one of our volunteers will accompany you
Agent: Good luck
consumer: Thank you very much

agent: Good evening, I'm here with you now

agent: It's good that you contacted us when you feel bad. First of all, tell me how you are physically after the injury today

consumer: and burns
consumer: burns
agent: You felt the need to feel pain
consumer: My face hurt so much
consumer: And I just wanted it to pass
agent: preference to replace the internal pain in external pain
consumer: true
consumer: This is not a new pattern, but there was a respectable break
agent: When it was really hard you came back to it

agent: How did the therapist suggest you deal with it?

consumer: I only use music
consumer: But even this has a limit to how much it can help and prevent me from harming myself
agent: Everyone has the most suitable ways of calming down
consumer: right...

consumer: especially my husband
consumer: I'm not hurting anyone
agent: It's understandable that he cares about you, but you feel it's your business with yourself
consumers: I shouldn't have gotten married and I shouldn't have had children
consumer: If I don't have anything to look for here anyway
consumer: Every hour that passes is completely unnecessary
agent: I can hear your desperation right now
consumer: Have you heard of Dr. Brenner?
agent: no, who is it?
consumer: Who is it... doesn't matter
agent: Tell me who it is
consumer: she's a psychiatrist specializing in stock injuries, she's one of the best, she's been with me for 5 years, I tried to send her an email so she might try to call and help me, but she's so busy, she's also the manager of the clinic, so there's no way she'll get back to me
agent: It's frustrating that you need her and she's not available
consumer: I was left alone in the world
consumer: without anyone caring
agent: You have a husband and children But you feel very lonely

consumer: They don't interest me
agent: You focus on yourself and what can make it a little easier for you
agent: I'm still here if you want to keep talking
consumer: I have nothing more to say. I am a complex case and it is difficult for everyone to deal with me, including nannies

agent: *feels a need

The assistance center responsible for your area is the Galilee-Golan Assistance Center, each center has a coordinator who knows the specialist therapists in our field in the area. I would recommend contacting the assistance center in your area, and asking the coordinator for recommendations. There are treatments through welfare and there are private ones. transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, is it possible to consult you regarding a certain matter?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I am here at your disposal
consumer: Hello, I am currently 21 years old, but between the ages of 15-18 I was in a relationship with someone who was about 3 years older than me.
Today, apparently, I am traumatized by the matter. During the relationship, many things were done that I think are illegal. But I'm not sure. Is there someone to consult with about this? If it does turn out that the things she did were indeed illegal, is it possible to take legal action on the matter?
agent: Hello, it's hard to be traumatized for so long
consumer: yes....
But is there anyone I can consult with regarding the filing of things that have been done?
Agent: Absolutely, would you like to Discuss it on the phone with Moshei or correspond?
consumer: I would prefer to correspond
agent: Gladly, I'm here
consumer: At the beginning of the relationship she was very much based on the sexual assault she went through in the past. If she hadn't told me that, we wouldn't be together.
Recently it became clear to me that she may have invented the attack.
She would buy me alcohol. Several times she hired me. And we've slept numerous times when she and I or just me are drunk.
I expressed several times that I was not interested in sex when we were drunk because it would have hurt her.
There were other things that are difficult for me to open right now.
I don't know how much there is to do with it.
agent: Sorry for asking, but from what's written I don't understand if I'm talking / from mech Are you with a man or a woman?
consumer: I am trans and use what flows near me
agent: It's really hard to live with such trauma for so many years. Have you been in therapy?
consumer: Yes, I'm still in therapy
consumer: Are the things I mentioned legal?
agent: I don't know, I'm not anymore, you should consult with legal aid or something else
consumer: What is meant by legal aid?
agent: You are asking about the legality of the acts, and legal advice can be obtained at any assistance center.
agent: Is the treatment you are receiving helping you?
consumer: Where is an assistance center close to Sderot?
Consumer: Yes
agent: There is in Be'er Sheva, and maybe also the center for men. I will send you the details of both
agent: Maslan's direct phone number (assistance center for victims and victims of sexual assault and violence Negev Beer Sheva) is 08-6421313.
Their email is: siyua@maslan.org.il

consumer: I don't think it's sexual assault literally, maybe just a bad sexual experience.
consumer: I'm a little ashamed to give it space because I feel guilty about it.
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I think I need help
agent: Good evening, I am at your disposal
agent: Hi, my shift is about to end,
agent: My shift is ending, I wish you a good evening
consumer: still available?
agent: unfortunately not, but the next assistant will be able to help
consumer: in this chat?
Agent: Yes
consumer: I'm waiting, I'm not even sure this is the right place for me, I think it was my fault and I brought it on myself
consumer: So maybe there is no way to help you
consumer: I was in a period of dating, I was with all kinds of men sea
consumer: It happened after my partner broke up with me, I felt I needed to punish myself physically
consumer: Some agreed to put on a condom and some did not
consumer: And the specific case that remains with me is the last guy
consumer: It was about a month ago, his name is Jonathan
agent: Good evening, I read what you wrote. I would be happy to try to help. I understand that you are not sure if things that happened to you are considered sexual abuse. I'll start by saying that we don't judge what is considered sexual assault and what isn't. We help to deal with the subjective feeling. the personal And if you feel that you have experienced incidents in which there was sexual abuse, I would think it appropriate to try to help us.
consumer: What happened is that he came to my house and from the beginning he was from Aggressive oud
consumer: he held my hands asked me if he could spank me and I said yes and he just started beating me until I had blue spots
consumer: He choked me, pushed my legs and covered my mouth so I wouldn't say anything or that I was in pain
consumer: I bled afterwards, not a lot but I needed a pad
consumer: He left, I haven't heard from him since but since then I can't touch men, can't even hug them, avoid shaking hands even with relatives
agent: It sounds like you went through a really, really difficult experience. This person allowed himself to hurt you, and strangle you, and shut your mouth, and have aggressive relations with you that even resulted in bleeding. No one deserves to go through such an experience. I am so sorry for you
consumer: I don't know what to do
agent: what do you think was the right thing to do? right for you you have ideas?
agent: It sounds like you feel the need to listen and share. And here is exactly the place for it
consumer: I am diagnosed with depression, borderline personality disorder and an eating disorder
consumer: And I have a nanny
consumer: But I'm ashamed to tell her, I feel it's my fault
agent: It is important for me to tell you that one of the most common reactions of those who have been hurt is feelings of guilt and shame. As if we are guilty. After all, the one who chose to be aggressive and aggressive and offensive towards you is this guy. He should be ashamed. He is guilty of terrible behavior. But there is always a part of us that cannot believe it, and takes responsibility and feels guilty A. When we are so not..
consumer: I'm scared, so scared
consumer: I was even hospitalized since then and I didn't tell the therapists there
consumer: I hardly sleep at night, I dream that he does it to me again in my bed
agent: It's important for me to remind you that what happened is already over. Usually when we are treated like this, we disconnect from our feelings, from ourselves. Maybe now you were able to connect with the most real emotion you had there, fear. It really sounds like a scary event.
agent: I believe that if you manage to gather courage and tell it - maybe you dare to allow the therapist to hold it together with you, you will be able to feel much less alone. And there is a chance that it will reduce the symptoms.
consumer: It's crazy, I deal with suicidal thoughts, yes I have a plan to kill myself (my therapists know this) but when it came from him, when I was afraid that he would kill me because he would suffocate me or that this pain would not stop, suddenly I was afraid to die. I was really afraid of it
consumer: But it's my fault, I agreed to sleep with him
agent: It's so exciting what you describe. Sounds like a very deep part of you does want to live, but when you experience the suffering, and you don't talk about it, the desire to hurt yourself comes, because you can't find another way to stop the suffering. But it's important to remember - that you don't have to stop life to stop suffering. You can focus on connecting to the deep parts of you, strengthen them and that they will be able to overcome the pain.
consumer: like what parts? The ones that make me sleep two hours a night? The ones that made me dare in your studies? be hospitalized? To hide it from everyone out of shame because then I will have to admit that I cheated?
agent: You write the answer - you wanted to sleep with him. And it's lovely. A connection and feelings for someone and a desire to sleep with someone - these are healthy and good things. But you didn't want him to abuse you and hurt you. This is not what you wanted. It can be very confusing. So remember - it is most normal to want to sleep with someone. It's not normal to do what he did. This is wrong. And he is not allowed.
consumer: Is it really forbidden for him?
consumer: or is it just in my experience?
agent: forbidden. forbidden. forbidden. No one is allowed to hurt you and abuse you and strangle you and shut your mouth - so that you cannot tell them to stop, and they are not allowed to have relationships with you that hurt you . and then also disappear. You deserve a relationship with someone who is gentle with you, and is with you and sees with you, and is in a relationship with you to make you comfortable and give you a good and loving feeling. He did the exact opposite. The opposite can be.
consumer: Well, this conversation is making me a little anxious, I think I'll stop
consumer: It gives me urges
agent: I apologize. Maybe we talked too long. Sometimes a too long conversation can raise the anxiety. So I suggest that we finish for real, and you are welcome to help us later when you feel the need.
consumer: Thank you
Agent: Good luck.

consumer: Good evening. I finished the 11th grade this year. In the middle of this year, I passed out sexually from a classmate. There was an intervention by P.S. who supported my request not to pass on the information to my parents. At the end of the school year, it was decided in a yeshiva that despite my parents' wishes, they must receive the information. Since then my life at home has become bad and restless because my parents do not know how to contain difficulties. I ask where are your rights to protect my privacy. Does the fact that I am still a student even though I am 18 plus cancel my rights?
agent: Good evening, I'm with you
agent: I understand that your parents have already received the information
Consumer: Yes
agent: It must be difficult when there is no understanding from the parents
consumer: Of course. The question is whether there was an exception here to what is allowed by law since I was over 18 years old
agent: good question
agent: I'm from Bina that you study in a yeshiva and that you finished the 11th grade even though you are 18 and a half years old?
Consumer: Yes
agent: And your parents know that another student sexually harassed you and that it's difficult for them
consumer: What I want to know is if the yeshiva violated my privacy legally
agent: I'll have to find out
consumer: Thank you
agent: What is the most difficult for you?
agent: In everything that happened
consumer: It happened to me that I lost trust in everyone
I thought I trusted them, the trust was broken, they told me there was permission not to tell my parents, they don't understand, I don't blame them, but they are disconnected and don't understand, I haven't told them anything my whole life because of this
agent: It's really hard when the artist is broke. Do you remember that you are not guilty?
agent: when the trust.
consumer: I honestly don't have the energy to talk about it myself I would really appreciate it if you could give me an answer regarding what I asked you, thank you very much
agent: Your question is very legitimate and understandable. It is very logical that you are hurt and it is important to you that your privacy be respected.
On the other hand, there is a law in the State of Israel designed to protect minors who have been harmed, if they have been harmed by someone responsible for them or in the family or in an educational institution. That's why you probably reported to your parents. But because I'm not an expert in the law, it's worth calling the Lynn house in your area, you don't have to identify yourself, and ask this question. or to the assistance center and ask to speak with the legal proceedings coordinator. 1202 or 1203. I wish for you that the parents receive assistance (also possible at an assistance center) so that they know how to be with you and for you.
agent: You can come to Beit Lin in your area of ​​residence through a Google search.

אחרי זמן מה הייתה דפיקה בדלת. אני מנסה להבין מי זה, הוא טוען חבר של אמא. שאלתי אותו איזה חבר? והוא המשיך לחזור על אותו המשפט. התעקשתי ושאלתי שוב, והוא אמר איזה שם שהיה נשמע מומצא, אבל לחץ עליי לפתוח את הדלת. עמדתי ביני לבין עצמי והתלבטתי. לפתוח? אבל ביקשו ממני שלא. אמרתי לו שאני לא יכולה להגיע למפתחות הבית, הם היו תלויים אל על ליד הדלת. תביאי כיסא ותעלי עליו. לא היה לי כוח, אבל עשיתי את זה בכל זאת. גררתי אותו, טיפסתי עליו, הגעתי למפתחות, ואחזתי בהם בידי. מה לעשות עכשיו? שאלתי. הוא ענה – תפתחי את הדלת. לא ידעתי איך פותחים את הדלת. תכניסי את המפתח בחור ותסובבי אותו הוא אמר. פתחתי לו את הדלת. פעם ראשונה בחיי שאני פותחת את דלת הבית. 
נכנס גבר זר שגדול ממני בכ40 שנה וסגר אחריו את הדלת. הוא הסתכל על המשחק ושאל אותי במה אני משחקת. אמרתי לו רכבות. הלכתי להראות לו את המשחק, והוא שאל אותי איפה המטבח. הצבעתי לו עם היד והוא הלך למטבח, התחיל לפתוח ארונות. אני רואה אותו עם גבו אליי, והוא תוך כדי חיפוש שואל אותי איפה יש כוסות?. הכוונתי אותו והוא הוציא כוס, מילא אותה במי ברז ופתח מגירה, שלף משם כפית. אני מביטה בו בתמיהה למשמע נקישות הכפית בכוס, כאילו מערבב משהו. הוא חוזר אליי עם הכוס ואומר לי שתי. אני אומרת לו שאני לא צמאה, אבל אז הוא מתעצבן ומתעקש שאשתה. שתיתי לגימה. תסיימי את זה! כעס עליי. שתיתי עד הסוף, הוא לקח את הכוס והיה נראה לחוץ. מהר מאוד הרגשתי מסוחררת והוא אמר לי את עייפה, בואי לישון. הוא מקים אותי ואוחז בידי ומוביל אותי לחדר השינה של ההורים. שם כשהתקרבנו למיטה כבר איבדתי את ההכרה. 
אחרי זמן לא מוגדר אני מתעוררת, מכוסה בשמיכה במיטה של ההורים, מביטה לשמאלי ורואה את אותו גבר עומד ובדיוק רוכס את מכנסיו. אני מעורפלת. מסתכלת מסביבי ולא מבינה מה קורה. נרדמת הוא אמר. אני מרימה את השמיכה ומתפלאת למראה גופי העירום. אני מסתכלת על הרצפה ורואה את הבגדים שלי זרוקים. למה אני לא לבושה? שאלתי אותו. הבגדים נפלו לך בזמן שישנת. השיב. זה היה נשמע לי תמוה, אבל לא התווכחתי. ולמה כואב לי? שאלתי. הוא כבר התעצבן. קומי ותתלבשי, מהר! אמר בכעס. היה נראה שהוא רוצה ללכת. לא הצלחתי לזוז. הוא הרים את הבגדים שלי והלביש אותי בעצמו. הוא לפת שוב את ידי והרים אותי וגרר אותי לאורך המסדרון עד לסלון. ואני מעורפלת ולא מבינה מה קורה. הוא מושיב אותי על הרצפה, ונותן לי הנחיה – תכף אמא מגיעה, תגידי לה שהרגע הגעתי ושרק שיחקנו במשחק הקופסא. הוא ביקש ממני לחזור אחריו ולוודא שהבנתי את ההוראה. 
זמן לא רב אחרי זה אמא שלי חוזרת, למראה גבר זר עם בתה הקטנה. מי זה?? מה הוא עושה כאן?? היא צועקת בבעתה. אני חבר שלה, באתי רק לשחק איתה. הוא אומר ברוגע. אמא שלי כועסת, ואני מחזקת את דבריו שאכן רק הגיע וכך היה. היא מסלקת אותו בצעקות ובעיטה, והוא בורח במהרה. היא נעמדת מולי, אוחזת בי חזק. הוא עשה לך משהו??. לא עניתי. רק שיחקנו במשחק קופסה. אז למה את נראית עייפה? זו שעת יום מוקדמת. סתם התעייפתי מהמשחק... עניתי והיא עם ארשת פנים מבוהלת קצת נרגעה, והלכתי לישון במיטה.

consumer: I was 7 years old, and like any normal girl I played a board game. It was a train game. The parents had to I went out and they asked me if I could manage without a babysitter or if they couldn't trust me. I told them that of course they could trust me, and I promised that I would not open the door to anyone, neither strangers nor their friends as they requested. It seemed easy, you don't even have to open the door. I can stand it. That's what I thought.
After a while there was a knock at the door. I'm trying to figure out who it is, says a friend of mother's. I asked him which friend? And he kept repeating the same sentence. I insisted and asked again, and he said some name that sounded made up, but pressured me to open the door. I stood between myself and hesitated. open? But they asked me not to. I told him I couldn't reach the house keys, they were hanging on me d the door Bring a chair and get on it. I had no strength, but I did it anyway. I dragged him, climbed him, reached the keys, and held them in my hand. what to do now? I asked. He answered - open the door. I didn't know how to open the door. Put the key in the hole and turn it, he said. I opened the door for him. First time in my life I open the door of the house.
A foreign man who is about 40 years older than me entered and closed the door behind him. He looked at the game and asked me what I was playing. I told him trains. I went to show him the game, and he asked me where the kitchen was. I pointed at him with my hand and he went to the kitchen, started opening cupboards. I see him with his back to me, and while searching, he asks me where are the glasses? turn off I gave him a drink and he took out a glass, filled it with tap water and opened a drawer, pulled out a spoon. I look at him in bewilderment at the sound of the spoon clicking in the glass, as if stirring something. He comes back to me with the glass and tells me two. I tell him I'm not thirsty, but then he gets angry and insists that I drink. I took a sip. Finish it! angry at me I drank until the end, he took the glass and looked stressed. Very quickly I felt dizzy and he told me you are tired, come to sleep. He stands me up and takes me by the hand and leads me to my parents' bedroom. There when we got close to the bed I already lost consciousness.
After an unspecified time I wake up, covered with a blanket in my parents' bed, look to my left and see the same man standing and just zipping up his pants. I am vague . I look around and do not understand what is happening. You fell asleep he said. I lift the blanket and marvel at the sight of my naked body. I look at the floor and see my clothes thrown. Why am I not dressed? I asked him. Your clothes fell off while you were sleeping. replied It sounded strange to me, but I didn't argue. And why do I hurt? I asked. He was already angry. Get up and get dressed, quick! said angrily. He seemed to want to go. I couldn't move. He picked up my clothes and dressed me himself. He grabbed my hand again and picked me up and dragged me down the hall to the living room. And I'm confused and don't understand what's going on. He sits me down on the floor, and gives me an instruction - mom is coming soon, tell her that I just arrived and that we just played the board game. he b He will make it difficult for me to go back after him and make sure I understood the instruction.
Not long after that my mother returns, to the sight of a strange man with her little daughter. Who is?? What is he doing here?? she shouts in her expression. I'm her friend, I just came to play with her. he says calmly. My mother is angry, and I reinforce his words that indeed he just arrived and that's how it was. She shoos him away with shouts and kicks, and he quickly runs away. She stands in front of me, holding me tightly. Did he do something to you??. I did not answer. We were just playing a board game. So why do you look tired? It's early in the day. I just got tired of the game... I answered and she, with a frightened expression on her face, calmed down a bit, and I went to sleep in bed.

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, I have a question. I am a manager at a manufacturing plant and one of the employees told me today that the school invited her and they informed her that her almost 9 year old daughter complained to the teacher that her 14 year old son had touched her in intimate places. The son looks after the daughter while the parents are at work. She was asked at school to keep the daughter away from the rest of the family and leave her under the supervision of her mother 24 hours a day, and the mother did so. Today she returned to work after a week's illness and cried. She claims that she doesn't believe her daughter but has no choice so she kept her away from the rest of the family but she doesn't know what to do and how to continue from here. Can you advise her?
consumer: Thanks, I'll wait for the message
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
agent: The mother and daughter should go to Lin's house
consumer: She is from Od is afraid that something will be done to her son.
consumer: She thinks the girl is lying
agent: I recommend Beit Lin again. There the girl and the mother can talk to professionals
consumer: ok thanks
agent: You can direct the mother to consult with us as well. or in anonymous chat
agent: By the way, you can also contact Beit Lin.
consumer: Yes, I will call her tomorrow morning, thanks
agent: with the mother?
agent: Look, by and large we don't want and don't want to believe that such a terrible thing happened. But the girl was probably hurt and felt a clear need to talk to the teacher. To help a mother who is really in a very complex situation, you should talk to someone who can help. At Beit Lin she will be able to receive assistance in every respect. It is important to remember that there is a legal obligation to report cases of injury to Teens
agent: In any case, it is also possible to consult as I wrote in Kolmila's chat anonymously
agent: You can also ask the mother if she would like an assistance coordinator to contact her
agent: The shift is over. The WhatsApp line will be available again tomorrow starting at 17.00

transcriptAll: Individual: הי Agent: הי Individual: לא יודעת איך להתחיל Agent: אני כאן להקשיב, תרגישי חופשי לשתף במה שעובר עלייך. Individual: אני חווה הרבה כאב Agent: זה נשמע קשה מאוד. את רוצה לדבר על זה יותר? Individual: חזרתי לפגוע בעצמי Agent: זה טבעי להרגיש ככה, אבל חשוב למצוא דרכים חלופיות להקל על הכאב. אולי ננסה לחשוב על אפשרויות יחד? Individual: אני מאוכזבת מעצמי Agent: זה חשוב שאת משתפת. זה כבר צעד חשוב לעבר שיפור המצב. Individual: לא מצליחה להירדם Agent: תנסי אולי לעשות פעילויות מרגיעות לפני השינה כמו קריאה או האזנה למוזיקה רגועה. Individual: תודה שאת כאן Agent: זה בסדר להרגיש כך. אנחנו כאן כדי להקשיב ולעזור.
transcriptAll_en: Individual: Hi Agent: Hi Individual: I don't know how to start Agent: I'm here to listen, feel free to share what you're going through. Individual: I'm experiencing a lot of pain Agent: That sounds very difficult. Do you want to talk about it more? Individual: I hurt myself again Agent: It's natural to feel this way, but it's important to find alternative ways to relieve the pain. Maybe we'll try to think of options together? Individual: I'm disappointed in myself Agent: It's important that you share. This is already an important step towards improving the situation. Individual: Can't fall asleep Agent: Maybe try to do relaxing activities before bed like reading or listening to calm music. Individual: Thank you for being here Agent: It's okay to feel this way. We are here to tap 12 and help.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, איך אפשר לעזור? consumer: היי, אני מרגישה רע ולא יודעת למי לפנות. agent: למה שלחת הודעה? consumer: אולי כי אני במצוקה. agent: מה את מרגישה? consumer: בחרדה ודחפים לפגוע בעצמי. agent: האם זה מתגבר? consumer: כן, לא יודעת מה לעשות. agent: לנסות משהו להרגעה? consumer: כואב לי בחזה. agent: כמה זמן כבר כואב? consumer: נראלי מאז הבוקר. agent: ניסית הסחות דעת? consumer: ניסיתי, אבל זה לא עובד. agent: מה יכולה לעשות כדי להירגע? consumer: לא יודעת, מרגישה עייפה אבל לא אצליח להירדם.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how can I help? consumer: Hi, I feel bad and don't know who to contact. agent: why did you send a message? consumer: Maybe because I'm in trouble. agent: how do you feel? consumer: with anxiety and urges to harm myself. agent: is it increasing? consumer: Yes, I don't know what to do. agent: try something to calm down? consumer: My chest hurts. agent: how long has it been hurting? consumer: Nerali since morning. agent: have you tried distractions? consumer: I tried, but it doesn't work. agent: what can you do to relax? consumer: I don't know, I feel tired but I won't be able to fall asleep.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, איך אפשר לעזור? consumer: אני מתעניין בשביל חבר שעבר התעללות בתיכון. agent: יש סיוע פסיכולוגי? consumer: כן, יש ארגונים שיכולים לעזור. agent: האם דיברתם על זה? consumer: כן, אבל הוא מתקשה לדבר על זה. agent: יש מספרי טלפון של ארגונים שניתן להתקשר אליהם. consumer: תודה רבה, זה יעזור מאוד.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how can I help? consumer: I am interested for a friend who was abused in high school. agent: Is there psychological assistance? consumer: Yes, there are organizations that can help. agent: did you talk about it? consumer: Yes, but he has trouble talking about it. agent: there are phone numbers of organizations that can be called. consumer: Thank you very much, this will help a lot.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, מה שלומך? consumer: ערב טוב, אני במצוקה. agent: מה קרה? consumer: אני עם פוסט טראומה מהתעללות מינית. agent: זה נשמע מאוד קשה, יש לך תמיכה? consumer: לא, המשפחה לא מאמינה לי. agent: יש מישהו שכן מאמין לך? consumer: רק אחי הגדול, הוא מנסה לעזור. agent: כדאי לנסות למצוא תמיכה מקצועית. consumer: קשה לי להמשיך ככה, אני לא יודעת מה לעשות.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how are you? consumer: Good evening, I'm in trouble. Agent: What happened? consumer: I have post-trauma from sexual abuse. agent: It sounds very difficult, do you have support? consumer: No, the family doesn't believe me. agent: Is there anyone who does believe you? consumer: Just my older brother, he's trying to help. agent: You should try to find professional support. consumer: It's hard for me to continue like this, I don't know what to do.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, איך אפשר לעזור? consumer: היי, אני מרגישה רע. agent: מה קרה? consumer: בחרדה ודחפים לפגוע בעצמי. agent: ניסית משהו להרגעה? consumer: לא, לא יודעת מה לעשות. agent: יש לך מישהו לדבר איתו? consumer: לא ממש, אין לי למי לפנות. agent: זה חשוב למצוא מישהו קרוב לשתף אותו.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how can I help? consumer: Hi, I feel bad. Agent: What happened? consumer: with anxiety and urges to harm myself. agent: Have you tried anything to calm down? consumer: No, I don't know what to do. agent: do you have someone to talk to? consumer: Not really, I have no one to turn to. agent: It is important to find someone close to share it.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, איך אפשר לעזור? consumer: אני מתעניין בשביל חבר שעבר התעללות. agent: צריך עזרה פסיכולוגית. consumer: כן, יש ארגונים שיכולים לעזור. agent: האם הוא מוכן לקבל עזרה? consumer: אני לא בטוח, אבל אני רוצה לנסות לעזור לו. agent: זה חשוב לנסות ולהמשיך לתמוך בו.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how can I help? consumer: I am interested for a friend who has been abused. agent: Need psychological help. consumer: Yes, there are organizations that can help. agent: Is he ready to get help? consumer: I'm not sure, but I want to try to help him. agent: It's important to try and continue to support him.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, מה שלומך? consumer: ערב טוב, אני במצוקה. agent: מה קרה? consumer: אני עם פוסט טראומה ממשהו שקרה בעבר. agent: זה נשמע קשה מאוד, יש לך תמיכה? consumer: לא, המשפחה לא מאמינה לי. agent: יש מישהו שכן מאמין לך? consumer: רק אחי הגדול, הוא מנסה לעזור. agent: כדאי לנסות למצוא תמיכה מקצועית. consumer: קשה לי להמשיך ככה, אני לא יודעת מה לעשות.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, מה שלומך? consumer: ערב טוב, אני במצוקה. agent: מה קרה? consumer: אני עם פוסט טראומה ממשהו שקרה בעבר. agent: זה נשמע קשה מאוד, יש לך תמיכה? consumer: לא, המשפחה לא מאמינה לי. agent: יש מישהו שכן מאמין לך? consumer: רק אחי הגדול, הוא מנסה לעזור. agent: כדאי לנסות למצוא תמיכה מקצועית. consumer: קשה לי להמשיך ככה, אני לא יודעת מה לעשות.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how are you? consumer: Good evening, I'm in trouble. Agent: What happened? consumer: I have post trauma from something that happened in the past. agent: It sounds very difficult, do you have support? consumer: No, the family doesn't believe me. agent: Is there anyone who does believe you? consumer: Just my older brother, he's trying to help. agent: You should try to find professional support. consumer: It's hard for me to continue like this, I don't know what to do.

transcriptAll: agent: שלום, איך אפשר לעזור? consumer: היי, אני מרגישה רע. agent: מה קרה? consumer: בחרדה ודחפים לפגוע בעצמי. agent: ניסית משהו להרגעה? consumer: לא, לא יודעת מה לעשות. agent: יש לך מישהו לדבר איתו? consumer: לא ממש, אין לי למי לפנות. agent: זה חשוב למצוא מישהו קרוב לשתף אותו.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Hello, how can I help? consumer: Hi, I feel bad. Agent: What happened? consumer: with anxiety and urges to harm myself. agent: Have you tried anything to calm down? consumer: No, I don't know what to do. agent: do you have someone to talk to? consumer: Not really, I have no one to turn to. agent: It is important to find someone close to share it.
